story:
The name of the business will be "Freeyourmobile Services" this having been chosen to convey the notion of liberating one's smart phone service from the restrictions of being tied to a particular cellular service provider. The business will engage in the sales of, and specialized services for , wireless communication devices.

Activities of the business would include:

Sales of new wireless communications devices and accessories

Provision of related services for cell phone and other cellular- enabled devices, including configuration and firmware upgrading.

Consultation with clients to ensure that device features are properly matched to clients needs.

The prospective clients could be anymore who needs flexibility and "carrier-portability" in their wireless services. This would include the student whose home is in another part of the world from where their school is located; a business person who regularly travels from Canada to Asia or Europe; a retired person who travels widely and regularly as part of their retirement plan . All of these people would be potential  customers if they wished to utilize the same cellular phone in different parts of the world.The prospective clients could be anyone who needs flexibility and “carrier-portability” in their wireless services.  This would include the student whose home is in another part of the world from where their school is located; a business person who regularly travels from Canada to Asia or Europe; a retired person who travels widely and regularly as part of their retirement plan. All of these people would be potential customers if they wished to utilize the same cellular phone in different parts of the world.

The concept of unlocking cellular devices is not a brand new one; however it is not, as yet, widely appreciated or understood; and there are only a few businesses performing the service, and a very, very few who specialize in this service.

Frequencies: For Smart phone to operate effectively throughout most of the world, you will want to have a tri-band phone that can operate at 1900MHz+1800MHz+900MHz or (better yet) a quad-band phone which can operate at 1900MHz+1800MHz+900MHz+850MHz.

A service provider is needed who is interested in “going the extra mile” for clients who have a busy schedule by meeting the clients at their choices of location and time. (The actual unlocking of the cell phone can be done just about anywhere with portable equipment.)

.

A World Wide Web site has been established (freeyourmobileservice.ca) as well as telephone and email facilities. A number of specialized tools have been acquired, and working relationships have been established with vendors of the specialized hardware and software required for the unlocking process.

The Online store is comprised of internet web pages which allow a customer to order items online, and pay online (thereforethe major credit cards accepted. As the technology evolves, other online payment methods maybe be utilized.

The business is currently operating on small scale with client referrals obtained primarily by “word of mouth”, and limited advertising via local newspapers and handbills. Discussions have taken place with cell service providers in both Canada and the United States as part of the ongoing research into the potential market for unlocking, and the variety of other services required by clients.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Tamara Robson I am currently self employed as a childcare provider. I have been in this field off and on for over 15yrs. I have raised three girls mostly on my own since the age of 17,  they are ages 32, 27 and 17.  During the  last 6yrs, providing daycare it has become a full time job as my marriage of 15yrs was dissolved I became a single parent needing a full time income. Life happens ;)  During that time, I developed a business idea and the business Idea I had planned while I first separated it but it stayed with throughout this period of time. Looking back on the grand scheme of things everything happens for a reason. One thing that has remained constant throughout this time is my desire to pursue this business idea, since I was a teenager myself and have had many people tell me what a great idea it is. I am very passionate about this model for business which stems from my belief that  I whole heartedly believe that these teens are our future and that they deserve a great place to have fun and discover themselves and their talents in a supervised social environment. I have examined similar models to this one that are up and running very successfully in the States, and believe that it is something  there is a market  for here in BC, in the lower mainland. I am very excited to present my business plan I am looking for start up costs.

Club Rayne is a teen night club and will have dual function and purpose. The week will be divided into two sets of programming.  It will be a hot spot for teenagers to safely engage in a social environment, during the first part of the week Monday to Wednesday it will be a venue for family activities.  We will offer a variety of programs that are family orientated like fundraisers and charity events that will be a great way to develop their social conscious and generate interest in social issues, which will give back to the communities.   From Thursday through Saturday from 7pm -12:00 am, the Club  will cater to teens between the ages of 13-18 years old. As a non-alcoholic club, Parents wouldn't  have to worry about stranded teens, as Club Rayne shuttle would provide a safe alternative free of charge with a ride home. A full time sub contracted security team will consist of personnel that have prior teen venue experience. A small group of off duty police officers are already in place, volunteering some off  duty time to make this a safe venue so parents can have peace of mind while teens are in the club. This will give bored teenagers a safe place to interact and build real relationships through a face to face environment and just through a not through a social media or gaming platform. Club Rayne will bridge the  gap in the marketplace that will allow a SAFE creative, outlet for them to learn and hone their social skills.

Some of these activities will include the following :

  • Dj night

  •  Dances top 40

  •  learning the latest  dance moves

  • singing competitions

  • charity events

  •  family events

  • community events

  • celebrity appearances

  •  company sponsored events and giveawys, and many more.

    The goal is to find a way to engage all teens, there are not enough social programs and or activities for them once they hit the age of 13. I realize that there intermittent programs throughtout  the various rec centers and high schools in the lower mainland, but these are few and far between and  dont offer  a consistent place to hang out. We have an opportunity here to bridge the gap  due to government cut backs to our school programs. The private sector is a great resource to help these teens to see their potential.  The government has tax credits in place to help with the costs of extra-curricular activities if there are programs available, this is where Club Rayne would meet the requirements for that source of funding.

    In a short few sentences I cannot begin to explain the possibliities and advantages that this type of club could bring to not only our teens but to  the ripple effect it could have on our communities. The potential opportunities are endless if you consider the movie industry and the  young stars that come here to film. The music special guest stars could catapult the Club to great popularity and add to the success of the Club I am passionate about this project and what we can do for our teens, please help us get this club up and running!

    My goal is raise the Start up costs to get this club up and running .

What We Need & What You Get


  • The funding we need would be used for music equipment, furniture and to procure a building for the business.
  • If the funds raised do not meet the goal it will go into a trust until the total amount can be raised.
  • As parents you will have piece of mind knowing that your kids are in a safe environment,having fun, developing the necessary socialskills they will need to make the right choices.This time in their lives is pivotal because some teens might make decisions that  have an unfortunate impact on the rest of their lives. Club Rayne could give them the creative outlet  and allow them to see their own potential.

The Impact


  • This project is valuable to the community because of the service it provides to teens that need a safe place to congregate and enjoy time to develop important social skills that are lacking in  teens. 
  • Traditionally for many generations, this seems to the vulnerable age for teens who dont have a safeplace to go ,I feel compelled to offer programming that presents choices that reinforce positive choice.
  • Clubs like this are very popular in the United States and have been running in some cases for more than 8 yrs without incident or any great  risk to the teens.
  • Raising enough money to get this project/business up and running.
  • I believe the biggest challenge to a Teen club will be keeping the un desired elements of drugs and Alcohol out of the venue , I also believe that a zero tolerance policy  enforced by the volunteer, off duty police officers will help to deter this challenge and give the club the advantage it needs to keep the teens safe and out of trouble.

Club Rayne is a teen night club and will have dual function and  purpose. The week will be divided into two sets of programming.  It will be a hot spot for teenagers to safely engage in a social  environment, during the first part of the week Monday to Wednesday it will be a venue for family activities.  We will offer a variety of programs that are family orientated like fundraisers and charity events that will be a great way to develop their social conscious and generate interest in social issues, which will give back to the communities.   From Thursday through Saturday from 7pm -12:00 am, the Club  will cater to teens  between the ages of 13-18 years old. As a non-alcoholic club, Parents wouldn't  have to worry about stranded teens, as Club Rayne shuttle would provide a safe alternative free of charge with a ride home. A full time sub contracted security team will consist of personnel that have prior teen venue experience. A small group of off duty police officers are already in place, volunteering some off  duty time to make this a safe venue so parents can have peace of mind while teens are in the club. This will give bored teenagers a safe place to interact and build real relationships through a face to face environment and just through a not through a social media or gaming platform. Club Rayne will bridge the  gap in the  marketplace that will allow a SAFE creative, outlet for them to learn and hone their social  skills.
Some of these activities will include the   following :


Dj night

 Dances top 40
 learning the latest  dance moves
singing  competitions
charity events
 family events
community events
celebrity  appearances

 company sponsored events and giveawys, and many more.
The goal is to find a way to engage all teens, there are not enough  social programs and or activities for them once they hit the age of 13. I realize that there intermittent programs throughtout  the various rec centers and high schools in the lower mainland, but these are few and far between and  dont offer  a consistent place to hang out. We have an opportunity here to bridge the gap  due to government cut backs  to our school programs. The private sector is a great resource to help  these teens to see their potential.  The government has tax credits in  place to help with the costs of extra-curricular activities if there  are programs available, this is where Club Rayne would meet the requirements for that source of funding.
In a short few sentences I cannot begin to explain the possibliities  and advantages that this type of club could bring to not only our teens but to  the ripple effect it could have on our communities.  The potential opportunities are endless if you consider the movie industry and the  young stars that come here to film. The music special guest stars could catapult the Club to great popularity and add to the success of the Club I am passionate about this  project and what we can do for our teens, please help us get this club  up and running!
My goal is raise the Start up costs to get this club up and running .

   What We Need & What You Get   The funding we need would be used for music equipment, furniture and to procure a building for the business. 
If the funds raised do not meet the goal it will go into a trust until the total amount can be raised.
As parents you will have piece of mind knowing that your kids are in a safe environment,having fun, developing the necessary socialskills they will need to make the right choices.This time in their lives is pivotal because some teens might make decisions that  have an unfortunate impact on the rest of their lives. Club Rayne could give them the creative outlet  and allow them to see their own potential.    The Impact   This project is valuable to the community because of the service it provides to teens that need a safe place to congregate and enjoy time to develop important social skills that are lacking in  teens. 
Traditionally for many generations, this seems to the vulnerable age for teens who dont have a safeplace to go ,I feel compelled to offer programming that presents choices that reinforce positive choice. Clubs like this are very popular in the United States and have been running in some cases for more than 8 yrs without incident or any great  risk to the teens.

  Raising enough money to get this project/business up and running.
I believe the biggest challenge to a Teen club will be keeping the un desired elements of drugs and Alcohol out of the venue , I also believe that a zero tolerance policy  enforced by the volunteer, off duty police officers will help to deter this challenge and give the club the advantage it needs to keep the teens safe and out of trouble.

story:
Greetings,

My name is Charles Purcell and I need your help. Back in 2008 I found myself homeless and living in a shelter. One day one of the guys in the shelter told me about this church called Emory United Methodist Church. So I went there on a Sunday because they served free meals to the homeless, Well when I went, I felt like I was home. I had not been to church in awhile and I could feel the spirit of the Lord surround me to assure me I was in the right place and everything would be okay. Well six months later, I was out of the shelter, had joined the church, and became active in their homeless ministry.

Right now Emory is going under a huge construction project. It is the dream of the Pastor and it will help the Northwest community in Washington, DC. See, unlike other churches, Emory wants to stay a community church and help the needs of real people. Because of the construction, the church and the homeless ministry has moved to temporary locations. This isn't cheap. So to help more, I want to start a business and donate 30% of what I make for it to go towards food, supplies, and overhead costs. I know this is an ambitious undertaking, but I know God will work it out.

So, I want to purchase a distributorship  with ABC Fundraising and become a fundraising consultant with them. ABC Fundraising is one of the top fundraising product providers in the United States. They have helped over 50,000 schools, churches, and non-profits to raise more than $50 million since 1993. They also have a A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau. So as you can see, they are a stable company.

They will supply me with names and numbers of people who are looking for fundraisers! I will be able to earn anywhere from $500 to $5000 a month or more! In the past I have done work behind the scenes with fundraisers. Helping to plan their events. I already have some personal, school and church contacts. So I can hit the ground running. I have always felt I could fulfill my dreams and with your support I know I can achieve them.

I don't want anyone to break the bank. So I'm only asking if each of you to help me with at least $1.00. That is the minimum contribution you can donate on Indiegogo. I need 2,000 people to help me by giving a one time gift of $1.00.

Now I understand that everyone can't give, but you can still help me get the word out. The way you can do that is to share this page on you Facebook page, tweet it on Twitter, or do both. The more people that see this, the greater chance I have of reaching my goal. So can I count on you? I only need a little help from my friends. I can get by with a little help from my friends.

Please do what you can by donating, sharing my page, or both. Trust and believe I won't forget your kindness and generosity. I will also pledge to pay it forward!

story:
Why we are running our campaign

More and more people around the world are joining terrorist groups such as Islamic State, killing innocent people, promoting hatred and adding to the misery of the Syrian people.

They have been drawn to do this a result of being radicalised. Islamist extremist organisations promote a hateful worldview which seeks to destroy freedom, democracy, human rights, and the belief that communities should coexist peacefully. In their destructive path to boost recruitment, they radicalise vulnerable people all around the world by perverting the religion of Islam for their own gain. When they target individuals, they exploit identity crisis, heartfelt grievances and other societal problems, offering “solutions” which only serve to exacerbate all of these.

Together as a society, with people from all backgrounds, religious denominations and political leanings, we can fight back against this hatred. Three things are important to this:

1)  Building resilience to prevent vulnerable people from falling prey to extremism. We can do this by addressing all the things that extremists exploit and demonstrating what makes living and engaging in a pluralist and democratic society so great.

2)  Raising awareness of radicalisation and the actions of extremist groups that want to curb your freedoms. We can do this by analysing extremist organisations, cutting through their propaganda to see the truth, and understanding how they came about.

3)  Promoting the best ways to tackle extremism in an effective, responsible and proportionate way, free of racism and anti-Muslim hatred, sensationalism and apologia. We can do this by learning from previous successful and unsuccessful efforts to tackle extremism, here in the UK and all around the world.

The campaign

We need your help to raise £25,000 to help us address extremism through the medium of film, for two main reasons. Firstly, it is clear that extremist organisations are increasingly adept at using technology and producing professional video content to achieve their aims of radicalisation and recruitment. Secondly, one of our main beliefs is that effectively countering extremism requires a civil society approach - financial support from global citizens united in the fight against extremism is a great way that our supporters can take ownership of this with positive action.

Your generous donations and support will help fight back against extremism by funding the production of three counter-narrative videos, targeted at the three areas listed above: building resilience, raising awareness, and promoting best practice. In addition, we will also be able to produce an educational animated video explaining Quilliam’s approach to counter-extremism

The creation of counter-narrative videos will help towards our day-to-day work to do the following:

  • Challenging Islamist ideology: The videos will help create effective counter-narratives which challenge the foundations of the hateful ideology which seeks to corrupt individuals to cause harm. Tackling the cause of extremism as a society, the ideology which underpins terrorist actions, will help ensure a safer environment for us all in the long-term.
  • Increasing education and awareness: Through encouraging civil society to actively engage in the creation and promotion of counter-extremism videos we can help increase awareness of the difference between Islamist ideology and Islam as spiritual faith practised by over a billion Muslims around the world today.
  • Tackling the rise of anti-politics sentiment:  By coming together and actively challenging these views by donating, sharing videos through Twitter, Facebook, YouTube as well as other social media platforms, we can work together to promote democratic ways of achieving real change and persuade others that joining extremist groups won’t help.
  • Addressing grievances: Many people justifiably oppose political decisions, find injustice reprehensible, or have experienced prejudice first hand. We stand in solidarity with those people and want to help everyone find peaceful, democratic and productive ways of addressing these issues, without resorting to myopic extremist narratives that paint all such grievances as evidence of a targeted conspiracy against Muslims.
  • Engaging communities: To effectively counter extremism, we need a civil society approach. Vital to the success of this approach is the co-operation of Muslim communities, who are often the first victims of terrorism, have had their religion manipulated by the few violent extremists among them, and live with the negative consequences of their actions. We want to promote the active involvement of Muslims in this generational struggle.
  • Promoting pluralism: Extremists love to target vulnerable people who aren’t sure of their place in society or of their identity. While it is completely normal to experience an identity crisis and to be unsure of the compatibility between nationality, religion, ethnicity and sexuality, extremists claim that you can overcome this feeling by following Islamism. Instead, pluralism is the only way that people can feel truly comfortable.
  • Countering extremism of all kinds: Extremism breeds extremism, and it is unacceptable to approach Islamism through a far-right lens, blaming all Muslims for the actions of several extremists, or by stooping to the low level of ignorant bigotry. It is important that we show consistent, responsible, proportionate ways of challenging all extremisms in our society that can make real change for the better.

Additional ways of getting involved

We don’t want to be the only ones making counter-narrative videos. If you are between the ages of 16-24, you can enter our #OpenYourEyes video competition. Create a short video addressing one of the following issues:

  • Why religion mustn’t be abused to promote violence
  • Talk someone out of expressing themselves through violence against themselves or others
  • Why a multi-faith environment is positive
  • Can the internet take over your life?

It could be a monologue or a song, a cartoon, a mime, a comedy sketch or anything else that you feel captures the imagination.

Use your phones, iPads, cameras or any other media device.

Please upload your film at www.wetransfer.com and then paste the link to your film in the form on our website http://www.quilliamfoundation.org/openyoureyes/ . Film resolution should be at least 1024×768 pixels. If you are recording the film from an iPhone/iPad or other mobile device, try using the HDR option for best results. Be interesting. Be bold. Be quirky. Be innovative.

For more information, visit the competition page on the Quilliam website: http://www.quilliamfoundation.org/openyoureyes/

How your money will be spent:

The money donated will be used to create a number of professionally filmed and edited counter-extremism videos as well as equipment which will allow for the creation of in-house counter-extremism videos.

Creating effective counter-narrative videos will require videos filmed using sophisticated cameras allowing for high definition content. We will enlist professional filmmakers who are enthusiastic about film and artistic creation with experience across a number of aspects of the film industry, including directing, producing, as well as audio and visual engineering. The videos will be professionally edited, maximising the effects and reach of each counter-narrative video. 

The knowledge and experience of the filmmakers used will help enrich video content produced, allowing us to capitalise on the medium of film to help challenge extremist ideology. Information is increasingly being absorbed through video content as opposed to traditional mediums such as books. Studies show that the medium of film increases understanding of issues, increases information retention, which in turn promotes civil society engagement and debate. With over 100 million users viewing at least one video online each day, professionally produced counter-extremism videos will allow us to effectively reach a worldwide audience in order to promote a long-term civil society push back against an ideology which seeks to promote hatred to undermine freedom.

About Quilliam

Quilliam is the world’s first counter-extremism think tank set up to address the challenges of citizenship, identity, and belonging in a globalised world. Quilliam stands for religious freedom, equality, human rights and democracy. We engage in innovative research, training and public messaging to do the following:

  • Challenge extremist ideology to expose the intellectual bankruptcy of the extremist worldview
  • Promote pluralism as an antidote to Islamism
  • Inspire positive change so that Muslims and others live harmoniously as citizens, not as separatist communities

Quilliam has consistently been at the forefront of countering extremism in the UK, since we were established in 2008. Some of our senior members of staff were formerly Islamist extremists themselves and this personal insight into extremist organisations shapes our analysis of how to counter the phenomenon of radicalisation. The experience of being involved in counter-extremism and shaping policy on the issue in the last 7 years, coupled with the academic expertise of some staff members means Quilliam continues to be intrinsic to the debate. Our work and approach remain vitally important, especially as the threat from extremism and terrorism to the UK and Europe is now greater than at any point since 9/11.

story:
BLACK MEDIA NETWORK

BMN is a collection of innovative and powerful news media brands that deliver compelling and visually engaging programming for African Americans. BMN will feature world-class brands including Morning Day®, 197.5 The Drop®, Politics as Usual®, Gametime®, "Black Industry®, Dollars and Sense®, Nightly News®, Original Series, Documentaries, and more. Providing the best in breaking news, live video coverage,  original journalism, lifestyle features and commentary. BMN is forecast to reach audiences of more than 15 million.

story:
Mission Summary

Aloha!

My name is Dontā Tanner and thank you very much for taking the time to review our campaign.  Your contributions will help establish a fitness facility that small businesses, their families, customers and our community as a whole will have convenient and affordable access, to improve their overall wellness through fitness.

After 20 rewarding and honorable years of military service, it is such a blessing to have the opportunity to continue pursuing my passions of fitness and helping people, full time.  Motivating and inspiring others to achieve their career goals, fitness, and life goals is an amazing feeling and brings out our best.  Likewise, cheering for the hardworking underdog and helping within the community where I could has always sat well with my heart.  This is why I have decided to join forces with Hawaii Ohana Marketplace (HOMe). 

To improve community wellness, HOMe was created and strives to help small businesses not merely to succeed but to thrive.  My role within the HOMe project and as founder of Hawaii Fitness Center, is to provide our family of small businesses, their families, customers and community as a whole, convenient and affordable access to quality fitness. 

With company taglines like “Striving for the excellence in you” and “Your fitness is our passion,” my mission with Hawaii Fitness Center is to help others achieve wellness through fitness by inspiring a lifestyle of fitness, globally.  As a personal trainer, I strive to do this one person at a time – As an educator I’ve done this one classroom at a time – As a military leader, one command at a time – And now as the founder of Hawaii Fitness Center and partnering with companies like HOMe, we can do this even better, one community at a time. 

In Hawaii, more than half the population is employed by small businesses, yet small businesses are closing their doors everyday.  The company I’m partnering with is creating an infrastructure and implementing benefits to support small business. 

I’m helping by adding an affordable, effective and convenient fitness facility.  Fitness makes people better and when people feel better, they do better.  The new Hawaii Fitness Center planned with HOMe will be a state-of-the-art facility offering results-driven personal training, group exercise classes, the most effective fitness equipment and more. 

What We Need & What You Get

This is where you can help.  We need your help with the fitness equipment.  Current equipment being utilized in my personal training studio is in excellent condition and will be transferred to the new facility to better accommodate our community, but more is needed.  We’re asking for $100,000.00 to help cover the cost of additional equipment.  If funds raised exceed the amount requested, these monies will be earmarked specifically for replacement and repair of fitness equipment, or for future projects like this to purchase fitness equipment.  If the full amount of the campaign goal is not achieved, we will certainly do our best with what we have. 

No gesture can fully express our gratitude for your generous support, so we sincerely offer these incentives to show our appreciation for your help:

Your contributions will be recognized and your name will be proudly displayed on our “Community Builders” wall and MORE for helping us strength our community!


Other Ways You Can Help

We totally understand if you just can't contribute financially, and we know that doesn't necessarily mean you don't want to help.  Here are some cool things you can do that doesn't cost a dime, but will help a bunch and only takes a few seconds.

  • Please get the word out and share this campaign with your family, friends, coworkers, classmates, in-laws and out-laws :)
  • You can also use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you so very much for your help, time and awesome support!

Many mahalos (thank you very much) to our outstanding partners Hawaii Wellness Directory and StorKeepers Self Storage for your amazing sponsorship!

With company taglines like “Striving for the
excellence in you” and “Your fitness is our passion,” my mission with Hawaii
Fitness Center is to help others achieve wellness through fitness by inspiring
a lifestyle of fitness, globally.  As a
personal trainer, I strive to do this one person at a time – As an educator
I’ve done this one classroom at a time – As a military leader, one command at a
time – And now as the founder of Hawaii Fitness Center and partnering with
companies like HOMe, we can do this even better, one
community at a time.  
In Hawaii, more than half the population is employed
by small businesses, yet small businesses are closing their doors
everyday.  The company I’m partnering
with is creating an infrastructure and implementing benefits to support small
business.  
I’m helping by adding an affordable, effective and
convenient fitness facility.  Fitness
makes people better and when people feel better, they do better.  The new Hawaii Fitness Center planned with
HOMe will be a state-of-the-art facility offering results-driven personal
training, group exercise classes, the most effective fitness equipment and more.  
   What We Need & What You Get 



This
is where you can help.  We need your help with
the fitness equipment.  Current equipment being utilized in my personal
training studio is in excellent condition and will be transferred to the new
facility to better accommodate our community, but more is needed.  We’re
asking for $100,000.00 to help cover the cost of additional equipment.  If
funds raised exceed the amount requested, these monies will be earmarked
specifically for replacement and repair of fitness equipment, or for future
projects like this to purchase fitness equipment.  If the full amount of the campaign
goal is not achieved, we will certainly do our best with what we have.  
No
gesture can fully express our gratitude for your generous support, so we
sincerely offer these incentives to show our appreciation for your help: 
Your
contributions will be recognized and your name will be proudly displayed on our
“Community Builders” wall and MORE for helping us strength our community!
 Other Ways You Can Help We totally understand if you just can't contribute financially, and we know that doesn't necessarily mean you don't want to help.  Here are some cool things you can do that doesn't cost a dime, but will help a bunch and only takes a few seconds.  Please get the word out and share this campaign with your family, friends, coworkers, classmates, in-laws and out-laws :) 
 You can also use the Indiegogo share tools!   Thank you so very much for your help, time and awesome support!Many mahalos (thank you very much) to our outstanding partners Hawaii Wellness Directory and StorKeepers Self Storage for your amazing sponsorship!

story:
Integrity Housecleaning Service

Introduction:

I know what you are thinking … housecleaning, housekeeping and maid services are a dime a dozen. And you are correct. They are everywhere.

However, an opportunity fell into our laps and we cannot pass it up. We need your help with start up expenses. We have the plan, experience,  brains and manpower … just need help from YOU.

The Opportunity:

There is an upscale, high-end apartment high rise scheduled to open very soon in our area. The property consists of 400 gorgeous, expensive units. Because of people we know, we have the opportunity to pick up 75% of the cleaning business in this complex. In addition, we expect a high referral rate from these clients.

Who are we?:

Three women who each have many years experience in the customer service industry, are highly attuned to cleanliness and image, pay attention to details and are not afraid of hard work. People who know us will vouch, the name appropriately describes our ethics, both in business and personal life. Our logo is: Our actions, our values … Integrity Housecleaning Service.

Our Goal for the donation campaign:

Start up expenses $2,500+

What does start up expenses consist of?:

  • Commercial vacuum cleaner
  • Green, unscented cleaning supplies
  • Commercial supply cart
  • Other cleaning tools and supplies
  • Insurance
  • Bonding
  • Uniforms
  • Business cards and advertising
  • Etc, etc and etc

Why do I say $2,500+?:

Well, that is the difference between bare minimal start up and good, quality start up.

The difference of a vacuum that will be replaced in 1 month and an industrial vacuum cleaner that will better handle daily use.

Or a cheesy online presence and a great website that generates more business.

Or better yet, it is the difference between SUCCESS and failure.

Closing:

We don’t expect any one person to give a lot.

Whether you donate or whether you are not able to donate, PLEASE SHARE with your friends and family AND ask them to share also.

It is the number of people donating $1, $5, $10 … that will help us meet the goal.

story:
My name is Ian Rankin. I am the father to my daughter Brodi(6 years old) 2 dogs, 1 cat, and 9 chickens. My wife is a kindergarten teacher and we will celebrate our 10 year anniversary in October!  I have been a truck driver for 2 years. This career change came after working as a chef for over 30 years! I became a truck driver to do what was necessary to support my family. We are the kind of family who always does things as a family! We knew the career change would come with obstacles, but the amount of time away from home is extremely difficult. While on the road I have missed my daughters first and last day of school, her award days, and a number of other family activities. 

I would like to raise money to use as a down payment for a new to me tractor. With this new tractor I will make the change from an employee to an owner operator. As an owner operator I will be able to support my family as well as be home more often!

story:
All Natural Goodness~

BS Grillin’ Company is a woman-owned enterprise based in Virginia, U.S.A. 

Celebrity Chef AJ, owner, and BBQ Pit-master Steve, husband to owner Rosa, took their love for great BBQ sauce and smoked meats to new heights when creating the BS Grillin’ Company - developing deep, rich BBQ sauce flavors with the subtlety of a sophisticated aged whiskey. BS Grillin’ Company’s sauces and relishes are made with fresh ingredients and taste delicious with chips, veggies, meats, sea food, and vegetarian/vegan options.

Why are we BETTER?

First, we are BETTER because we offer versatile healthy condiments for today's health-conscious consumers. No other BBQ sauce or relish has as many uses as our products. Our products are interchangeable and will satisfy your taste buds, heat or sweet cravings. 

- Our relishes replace pickle relish in any recipe such egg and tuna salad, deviled eggs, potato salad, pinto beans, homemade tartar sauce, over a soften block of cream cheese, and more!

- We use the freshest fruits and veggies  along with real Bourbon and Brandy in our BBQ sauces.

 - Our BBQ Sauces replace salsa, ketchup, cocktail sauce, steak sauce, marinade, crock-pot sauce, and BBQ sauce just to name a few. Look how much money we just saved you - wow!

Our healthy condiments have a homemade look with a gourmet taste, just like from grandma's kitchen from the upper East side. We are currently manufacturing Kickin’ Pineapple with Honey Bourbon and Smokin’ Chipotle with Apricot Brandy BBQ Sauce.

So Why Do We Need Your HELP???

Good question!  Our customers are now requesting our relishes in stores and online after falling in love with our BBQ sauces.

We have Sweet Zucchini, Green Apple, Sweet Bell, Medium and Blazing Peppers, Autumn, and Green Tomato ready for manufacturing. 

Secondly, we have received multiple requests for our BBQ sauces and relishes, packaged in 1.5 oz jars, in a  variety gift pack for specialty shops.

Clean great tasting condiments......“And that’s no BS!”

What We Need & What You Get

Two of our 14 BBQ Sauces are currently in retail stores, and our customers have waited patiently for the launch of our vegetable relishes. We are ready to launch two of the seven relishes with your help. We are seeing great organic growth with our current products and more than 50% of our relishes have been pre-ordered. YEAH US~

This $19,000 will help us make a successful launch of the two 16 oz relishes and 1.5 oz gift size,  and continue to grow by working closely with distributors. 

  • We have lots of yummy BS condiments coming to you for your investment.
  • We pray to double our goal, but the first half of the goal monies will go to launching the relishes. You have our word. 

The Impact

How does BS Grillin' Company impact the world? Another good question! BS Grillin' Company provides all-natural goodness and gluten-free condiments to one family at a time, while saving you money. This is an easy way to add more delicious veggies and tasty lean meats to your family's diet. 

The Challenge Ahead

Join us in growing our two condiment lines into additional lines in the future to provide more great tasting wellness food options.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you're not able to contribute financially, I hope you'll consider talking about this campaign and spreading the word to people you know who might be able to lend a helping hand. 
- Like US on Facebook
- Visit our website
- Share our post 
- Share our campaign 
- Request BS Grillin' Company products at your local retailer
Just want to buy our sauces online? Visit our store on Amazon! You can find some great recipes for our sauces and relishes here!

story:
Meet Hypeist

Welcome to Hypeist’s Indiegogo page! We set this up to move forward in achieving our dream of making advertising suck less.

Over the past four years while studying Advertising at Syracuse University, we’ve seen technology completely reshape the way brands and consumers interact. Brands are struggling to engage with consumers who have been growing intolerant of disruptive ads in their digital lives. We see an opportunity to make brand experiences more engaging, more user-centric, and more immersive. We've realized that consumers are actually excited to engage with brands when they're being rewarded for their fandom.

What we do:

This inspired us to create Hypeist, a platform for users to earn exclusive products, experiences, and content from their favorite brands. Our first avenue to achieving this vision is through beacon-powered scavenger hunts in New York City where users can hunt for hidden products like backstage passes or limited edition sneakers.

Last semester, we ran hunts on-campus at Syracuse University for Red Bull, Amazon, Chipotle, and some other brands through social media. We were also awarded with 1st place in the Raymond von Dran technology startup competition. Right now, we're part of a Student Accelerator, where we are currently building our mobile product.

After our demo day on June 26th, we’re planning to move to New York City where we will continue development and launch our product.

But to get there, we need a little help...

Your generous contributions will enable us to begin operations in New York City and get us through our beta testing phase. This will help us power forward to the next stage, where we will be ready to seek investment.

   Any and every donation helps, and we appreciate your generosity!  


The Perks:


Thank you!

The Hypeist Team


                    Check us out online @ Hypeist.com and on Twitter @Hypeist.

story:
What are we?

We are a Not for Profit organisation of fifty local crafts people who support and promote crafts handmade in Limerick. We walked into an empty building last July and together we transformed it into the bright, busy space that you see today. Our exclusive high calibre craft outlet has a gallery space at the rear. We also have three fully operational craft studios which are open to the public. Kate Ramsey operates out of the felt making studio with her two hard working assistants Tess and Gareth. Fergus is our resident silver smith in the jewellery studio, and Aoife Slattery, Mary Conroy and Clare Jordan make gorgeous ceramics in the ceramics studio. They also fire their pieces here in our small kiln. We want to invite more people to use the kiln with us! We are expanding, growing and once again need your help to do this. We are a Legacy Project from Limerick City of Culture 2014. We want to continue the excitement and new burst of life that Limerick City of Culture brought to the people of Limerick. We provided a space for the public to knit a giant scarf for Granny when she visited Limerick. Our thriving Community Craft Corner grew out of that giant event. Come and knit with us every Monday and Friday morning for charities and for fun! We also run craft workshops for everyone on a regular basis. Fingers crossed with your help we can continue to grow and thrive and provide a much needed resource for crafts, crafts people and the local community. 


What do we need in a nutshell?

We need to upscale for you! We want to surpass our current success and offer you more by improving our already wonderful craft shop, gallery and studio spaces.

We have secured a grant from LEO but need to match it with our own funds to actually receive the grant. This is where you guys come in, we need your help to raise those funds! The money raised will go towards a bigger kiln, a new coffee machine, a more dependable and faster till system,  and laptops for our marketing team. We want to be able to offer you more workshops, events, public rentable kiln space, a relaxed atmosphere in which to enjoy a coffee during community crafting and a greater overall experience when you walk in through our doors. See more in our video gallery. 


What you lovely people will receive if our services

are upgraded!

Your contribution to us will be so valued and appreciated. We will be able to invite you, our new friends, to use the new bigger kiln with us. We hope that we can provide a much needed service for graduates of Limerick School of Art and Design, Limerick College of Further Education and local ceramists or people who just have a love for the old clay. We're excited to have more room for expansion, fun and creativity.

The coffee machine will mean you guys can drop in and stay for even longer on our beautiful premises and sample some of our locally roasted coffee beans from Ponaire. The Community Craft Corner mornings will be even more of a lovely experience with the new coffee machine to keep you happily crafting and chatting on Monday and Friday each week. 

Sinead, Mary and Karen on the sales team will be able to serve you stress free with the new till system installed. It will make your shopping experience here in the Hub 100% more relaxed and enjoyable as we will be able to serve you without freaking out over our current silly till system!

Holly and Valentins would be extremely grateful in the form of many new exciting and visually stunning marketing campaigns for new events and workshops. (And yes our marketing team has the best names in the world!)


This is what our Perks look like!

All of our perks are locally crafted to the highest standard, each item is unique and we cannot wait to give them to you!


I want to help but am monetarily poor at the moment...

Don't worry if you cannot help us in money donations. We would really appreciate if you could share this on your Facebook, send a pigeon to your uncle, write a letter to your professor, use morse code to contact your first girlfriend, smoke signals to your neighbours and maybe use the bat signal for Batman? Even if you have managed to scrape together some money for us, we would love it if you could spread the word also! Thank you ever so much for your support!

story:
Share the Love Kid's Club and Zeteo Coffee (pronounced zeh-tā-ō) is an indoor play space and full service specialty coffee bar, coming to 911 Oak Street in beautiful downtown Conway, Arkansas, directly across from the Chamber of Commerce. We couldn't have asked for a better location with over 5,500 square feet and our own very large parking lot to keep you and your little ones safe!


Our total funding needs are $235,000. This amount covers building renovations, equipment for the Kid's Club, coffee bar build-out, coffee bar equipment, furnishings, draftsman fees, employee training, and all other expenses associated with this venture.

   $80,000 - Zeteo Private Investment
   $80,000 - Share.The.Love Kid's Club Private Investment
   $75,000 - Crowdfunding
$235,000  - Total


Play. Relax. Give Back.

  1. Play.
    We are an indoor play space focused on providing your child a safe, clean, and imaginative environment to explore and play! We have multiple interactive and sensory play spaces. We will offer group rates, birthday parties, and private party rental!
  2. Relax.
    Don't worry parents. We had you in mind when creating the space! Our 3,000+ square foot building will be refreshing, hip, and full of comfy seating so you can take a break from the chaos of life, enjoy time with a friend, or play with your little one without worrying about messing up your home! Best part, we are adjoined to Zeteo Coffee Bar for all your caffeinated and yummy snack needs! Coffee + play= win for everyone!
  3. Give Back.
    5% of every dollar will help foster children in Arkansas! Your purchase will help foster children be placed in safe and loving foster families through our partnership with the CALL, as well as help waiting foster children find adoptive forever homes through our Project Zero partnership! Giving back has never been so fun!

  1. Quality Coffee, Quality Experience
    Zeteo Coffee is bringing a quality local coffee offering in downtown Conway. We are passionate about excellent coffee and the culture that goes with it. This will be the place to grab your favorite specialty drink or food item and enjoy great conversation with a friend, simply hangout, study or take a afternoon coffee break. We are conveniently adjoined to share.the.love KIDSCLUB, an indoor play space for children and families, therefore, Zeteo will service the club's patrons in addition to serving our valued coffee customers.
  2. Drink Well & Give Well
    We aren’t just about the coffee though. Zeteo Coffee cares about giving back and has seen first hand what lack of clean water access does to already impoverished communities. Because of this, Zeteo has incorporated giving back into our business model, by pledging     5% of all profits to the installation and restoration of clean water wells through Living Water International, who operates in 21 countries worldwide. So by making a purchase at Zeteo Coffee, you will truly Drink Well and Give Well!
story_txt:
Share the Love Kid's Club and Zeteo Coffee (pronounced zeh-tā-ō) is an indoor play space and full service specialty coffee bar, coming to 911 Oak Street in beautiful downtown Conway, Arkansas, directly across from the Chamber of Commerce. We couldn't have asked for a better location with over 5,500 square feet and our own very large parking lot to keep you and your little ones safe!Our total funding needs are $235,000. This amount covers building renovations, equipment for the Kid's Club, coffee bar build-out, coffee bar equipment, furnishings, draftsman fees, employee training, and all other expenses associated with this venture.   $80,000 - Zeteo Private Investment   $80,000 - Share.The.Love Kid's Club Private Investment   $75,000 - Crowdfunding$235,000  - TotalPlay. Relax. Give Back.

Play.We are an indoor play space focused on providing your child a safe, clean, and imaginative environment to explore and play! We have multiple interactive and sensory play spaces. We will offer group rates, birthday parties, and private party rental!


Relax.Don't worry parents. We had you in mind when creating the space! Our 3,000+ square foot building will be refreshing, hip, and full of comfy seating so you can take a break from the chaos of life, enjoy time with a friend, or play with your little one without worrying about messing up your home! Best part, we are adjoined to Zeteo Coffee Bar for all your caffeinated and yummy snack needs! Coffee + play= win for everyone!


Give Back.5% of every dollar will help foster children in Arkansas! Your purchase will help foster children be placed in safe and loving foster families through our partnership with the CALL, as well as help waiting foster children find adoptive forever homes through our Project Zero partnership! Giving back has never been so fun!



Quality Coffee, Quality ExperienceZeteo Coffee is bringing a quality local coffee offering in downtown Conway. We are passionate about excellent coffee and the culture that goes with it. This will be the place to grab your favorite specialty drink or food item and enjoy great conversation with a friend, simply hangout, study or take a afternoon coffee break. We are conveniently adjoined to share.the.love KIDSCLUB, an indoor play space for children and families, therefore, Zeteo will service the club's patrons in addition to serving our valued coffee customers.


Drink Well & Give WellWe aren’t just about the coffee though. Zeteo Coffee cares about giving back and has seen first hand what lack of clean water access does to already impoverished communities. Because of this, Zeteo has incorporated giving back into our business model, by pledging 5% of all profits to the installation and restoration of clean water wells through Living Water International, who operates in 21 countries worldwide. So by making a purchase at Zeteo Coffee, you will truly Drink Well and Give Well!

story:
How you doing? I'm Nick, the CEO of Geeks United Charitable Foundation, a Wisconsin based 501 (c)(3). Brad, my COO, and I decided to set up this campaign as a way for people to pre- order the shirt you see above and the one with our R2D2 Logo on it. 


Very simple. you pick the level you want and you order the shirt. When the shirts run out, they run out. There will be 50 of each and when they are gone, they are gone. The print in this style will never be printed again. The TIE and R2D2 variants will be available again but in different styles. 


If you are new to GU and our geeky ways check us out by clicking here or copy and paste the link, https://www.facebook.com/GeeksUniteHQ?__nodl, that brings you to our corporate page where you can navigate to our other groups and pages. 


Thanks for your time and #staygeeky.

story:
Our Story

Our Alaskan agriculture community needs a multi-use agricultural processing  facility for small family farms, that can provide services such as: 

  • Cold Storage- for short & long term food holding
  • Commercial Kitchen- for farms creating value added product such as chili, tea, honey, syrup, jams, jellies...
  • Rooms- for agricultural classes & farmer meetings
  • Agricultural Processing Space- that a single family farm cannot afford
  • Retail Space- for farms products & creations to be sold in a central location

        Help create a healthy and sustainable Alaskan agriculture through community support!

With an estimated 680 family-run farms in Alaska we grow a generous amount of food, but 95% of Alaskan food is being imported.  As the state struggles with a $3.5 billion deficit, the Alaska Division of Agriculture and its supporting programs are facing massive budget cuts, including cuts to our state seed potato programs, farm to school program, agricultural inspections and a number of other agricultural supporting programs.

Not only does all of this damage our local family farms, all of that food being imported is bad news for FOOD SECURITY.  

Globalization and modern transportation- rather than making it more secure has left Alaska extremely vulnerable.  And what about all those buzz words these days like organic, sustainability, community supported agriculture, the value of fresh picked and the elusive goal of food security? 

Alaska agriculture may be small in comparison to other states because the farms and ranches of Alaska are all mom and pop operations…no corporate farms here.  

Turning the tide from importing to local grown the Alaskan peony industry has paved the way to start this agricultural movement. One of the fastest growing industries in Alaska, Alaskan peonies have been shipped to every state in the U.S.A. and they are now starting to travel WORLDWIDE. For the first time Alaska is exporting something besides oil and fish.  Now that we have shown how overwhelmingly successful our Alaskan agricultural can be it is time to apply this success to other facets of Alaskan agriculture! 

But we realize that awareness doesn’t grow food— that takes doing.  

Here’s where you come in…


Perks

Peony Note Cards

 For $20 we’ll mail you 10 blank note cards with envelopes, each with a different picture of an Alaskan peony variety.  Enjoy these multitude of blooms produced by  the Alaskan peony industry!

The Alaska Peony Tote

For $30 you can show your support for the Alaskan agricultural movement with our Alaska Peony tote bag!  Great for shopping, the beach, or carrying produce home from your local farmer's market.

~ This bag (20x14.5 inches) has a zipper on the main compartment, reinforced handles, open front pocket, and 2 side mesh pockets.

Peony Canvas Print

Wish you could have peonies to look at even after season?  Well for $50 here’s a 12 x 8 inch print canvas with our Alaska peonies featured on it!  Choose from a pink, red, white, coral, or blush peony image!  (Canvas print comes stretched on a frame.) 

~Know a peony lover that would enjoy these blooms?  This also makes a great Christmas/Valentines/Birthday present!

Tote & Canvas Pack

Like more than one thing here?  For $75 get the Alaska Peony tote PLUS a 12 x 8 inch print canvas with your choice of pink, red, white, coral, or blush peony image!

Tote, Cards & Canvas Pack

Okay, you're a big agricultural supporter and floral. Want all of this stuff?  Not a problem.  For $95 you will get:
  • 10 blank note cards, each with a different peony image
  • The Alaska Peony tote 
  • A 12x8 inch print canvas with your choice of pink/red/white/coral/blush peony image

Flower Crown Kit for 2

But you don't want a print of a peony, you want to see fresh Alaskan peonies for yourself?  For $150 how about we send you a flower crown kit for two?  The kit includes: 30 mixed color Petite (miniature) peonies, instructions, and all the extras needed to make two flower crowns right at home.  You can use just the peonies we send or also mix in some of your local wild or garden flowers into your crowns!  

Bonus instructions will be included to make a matching boutonniere.  

This pricing includes the kit with fresh Alaska peonies being mailed overnight to you during the height of Alaska peony season in July. 

~Know a flower/craft lover that would enjoy this kit?  A gift certificate explaining about this perk and your support of local agriculture can be sent to them for Christmas/Birthday/Valentines gifts!

Fresh Peony Mix Box

Not into flower crowns but still would love some Alaskan peonies?  For $200 you can get a mixed box of Alaska peonies shipped fresh to you during our harvest season!

40 Alaska peonies: (20 Petite peonies and 20 full size peonies) of mixed colors & varieties. The box of fresh Alaska peonies will be mailed overnight to you during the height of Alaska peony season in July. Price includes overnight shipping.  

~This makes a great present to a mother/wife/girlfriend/boyfriend/grandfather...!

Set of 3 Large Canvas Peony Prints

Want your walls covered with luscious Alaskan flowers?  For $300 get three canvas prints (26x26 inches, 12x12 inches, 12x12 inches) with your choice of pink, red, white, coral, or blush peony images.  

~PLUS the Alaska Peony tote!

Sponsor a Peony Patch

Get involved personally with Alaskan agriculture!  For $350 sponsor your own peony patch in one of the most remote flower farms in the country!  Peony patch sponsors receive email updates of your peony patch with photos from spring to harvest.  

See weather, animals, and farm hands all effect the growth and beauty of these blooms as they sprout and mature in breath-taking Alaskan scenery.  At harvest sponsors will then be shipped a box of 30 fresh Alaskan peonies (mixed sizes) from their sponsored patch.  

Choice of white or pink peony patches.  Average shipping dates for stems is: 7/18/16- 8/7/16.

~Know someone whose wedding/birthday/anniversary is next year between 7/18/16-8/7/16?  Sponsor a peony patch in their name!  We will send them a card notifying them of the gift and then the periodic emails with photo & email updates of the peonies as they grown and are ready to ship for the big day! 

Show You are Awesome to the World

Local agriculture sales and improvements grows with the help of the community like you.  For $425 have your name engraved on a tile to be placed in our new and improved agricultural facility for the world to see you support of local agriculture and family farms!
Plus get:
  •  The 10 blank note cards each with a different peony image
  • A 12x8 print canvas with your choice of pink, red, white, coral, or blush peony image 
  • The Alaska Peony tote
  • The box of fresh peonies mailed to you during harvest season! 

~Know a flower lover that would enjoy this?  A gift certificate can be sent to them for Christmas/Birthday/Valentines gifts!

The Summer of Alaska Peonies

So, one box of peonies would just be a tease for you?  How about you experience the full Alaskan peony season with a box being send once a week (for 4 weeks in a row) of 20 peonies shipped to your door.  For $600 show your support for small farms, get some of the most exclusive flowers in the world, plus we will engrave your name on a tile for display in our pack house & send you the peony tote.

~As a gift this will get you in REALLY tight with someone you're trying to impress.  Wife, mother-in-law, boyfriend...whoever it is we can send them a gift certificate explaining your awesomeness in FULL detail and then they will get four weeks of Alaskan flowers shipped overnight to their door in the summer!


Handmade Alaskan Birch Burl Bowl

Have a permanent piece of Alaska to always proudly display.  For $800 this is an Alaska birch burl bowl with birds-eye markings.  Designed by nature and carved by hand, there is no repeating this bowl, a true one-of-a-kind.  The birch burl wood was harvested from one of our remote Alaskan peony farms and has been treated with a water proof finish.  Safe for hard candies, display, or a catch-all. 

Plus we'll send you the Alaska peony tote & note cards! 

Peony Party!

Come on Alaskans! $1,000 is only half your PFD and you know you want to party—while supporting responsible local economical and agricultural growth!  

Attend a Peony Party at our new facility in the Matanuska-Susitna Valley during July next year (2016) with all Alaskan grown food being served.  See your name engraved on a tile in the facility you helped fund (can include company logo on tile for donors of this level)!  AND everyone goes home with a bouquet of peonies, the peony note cards, the 12x8’’ peony canvas print, and the peony tote. 

~Companies that sponsor at this level can not only get their logo on their tile, but will be openly acknowledged as agricultural & small farm supporters in coverage about this fund raising effort and any press coverage about the facility & at the party.  

The Luxury Peony Wedding

Is your wedding between 7/18/16 ~ 8/7/16?  Have your big day covered in large and lush Alaskan peonies!  

For $2,000 we will mail overnight 300 Premium grade peonies (150 white, 150 pink), AND the kit for 2 flower crowns of matching colors.  (Our Premium peonies are our LARGEST blooms, averaging 7-11 inches once fully open.)  

This is a very limited perk- only 2 weddings will be able to show off these Alaskan peony wedding photos for years to come.

~ This also makes the most memorable and tear rendering wedding gift ever!


Big Time Farm Supporter

Love that aerial shot in our video & would like to go there yourself?  Have some money you've been saving up for an unforgettable adventure? For $5,000 we will send two people on a small plane scenic flight from Anchorage to stay at one of the most remote flower farms in the nation!  
This homestead farm is 40 miles from the nearest road, and completely off the grid!  Tour the farm, stay in a hand built cabin with lake & mountain view, enjoy homemade food, and have opportunities to go fishing, canoeing, and view wildlife. 
Small plane flight from Anchorage for 2 people and room/board for 2 night stay on us!  This is the ultimate Alaskan tour experience!  Plus a BIG tile (can include company logo) with your name in our facility, the peony tote, note cards, & 12x8 inch peony canvas print.

Our New Best Friend

Okay the trip to the remote peony farm sounds good, but you want to take the whole family AND you want to stay longer?  For $10,000 we’ll fly four people from Anchorage to the farm to stay four nights.  
You'll have a scenic flight to bush Alaska from Anchorage, tour the farm, enjoy homemade Alaskan food made from locally grown/harvested goods, stay in a handmade cabin with a lake & mountain view, and have opportunities for wildlife viewing, fishing, and canoeing. 
Plus we’ll have a BIG tile (can include company logo) with your name in our pack house and send you home from your one-of-a-kind Alaskan adventure with the peony notecards, the peony tote, and the 12x8 inch peony canvas print. 

Challenges & Benefits 

Our area’s need for a multi-agricultural processing center is not a new concept or development.  Our local and state government has acknowledged the need and shortfall, and over many years has made multiple attempts to examine the issue and create a facility.  However, bureaucracy and budgets have prevented anything from ever being built. Small farms can't wait any longer, its time to move away from the bureaucracy and build it ourselves!

Food security and locally fresh food are imperative issues in today’s environment.  Cost inefficiencies of importing food are well know, along with the health and economic growth shown in supporting locally grown food.  As our local agriculture grows so does the health and well-being of our community.  Not only does developing local agriculture create jobs, it increase income in many other local supporting companies such as insurance, refrigeration, local trucking, supply stores, grocery stores, etc. 

If we could get just 10% more of our food from local grown sources then we would have $250 million going back to Alaska.  

Please help us build this facility.  You will be helping potentially hundreds of local farmers, improve their operations and livelihoods, start a movement to diversify our state economy, and support a movement towards a healthier and more secure food source for many Alaskans.

Alaska farmers need your help!  

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread awareness of our project!  Share our posts on your social media and ask your friends and family to repost.  The more support we get the greater an agricultural facility we can create!

www.facebook.com/AlaskaAg

www.instagram.com/alaskaagricultural

www.twitter.com/AKAgProcessors

www.youtube.com


And don't forget to shop and support Alaska Grown!

story:
HELPING DONA MARIA / MRS MARIA LETS HELP


Mrs. Maria 86-year- old who lives in one of the largest invasions of San Pedro Sula called "Flor de Cuba " (given by the government to low-income people over Areas ) is one of the poorest inhabitants of this " INVASION " their housing conditions are inhuman and some uninhabitable. Ms. Maria despite their great needs is a helpful person and very attentive to their guests. She lives with her husband Don Alberto 59, two grandchildren and a newborn grandson in a 2 "rooms" if you could call ... the bathroom is outdoors and all faeces and urine lay in the backyard ; Besides all the soap and shampoo residues that are next to the stool, it seems incredible that anyone could live like this ... I am filled with nostalgia and pain their situation.


The two bedrooms are not similar nor to a winery , is a wet and gloomy place with a bed (if you can call it that way) misplaced and can notice the dirt of the place ... to imagine that here live 5 Human it makes me goosebumps ...

I am a medical student and I love helping people so what Ive achieved to this day (since it does not work just devote myself to my studies) is to cleanse the land and teach them how to eliminate waste and ... do no more pollution than there already ...

NEEDS OF Doña Maria and her family:

story_txt:
HELPING DONA MARIA / MRS MARIA LETS HELP

Mrs. Maria 86-year- old who lives in one of the largest invasions of San Pedro Sula called "Flor de Cuba " (given by the government to low-income people over Areas ) is one of the poorest inhabitants of this " INVASION " their housing conditions are inhuman and some uninhabitable. Ms. Maria despite their great needs is a helpful person and very attentive to their guests. She lives with her husband Don Alberto 59, two grandchildren and a newborn grandson in a 2 "rooms" if you could call ... the bathroom is outdoors and all faeces and urine lay in the backyard ; Besides all the soap and shampoo residues that are next to the stool, it seems incredible that anyone could live like this ... I am filled with nostalgia and pain their situation. 


The two bedrooms are not similar nor to a winery , is a wet and gloomy place with a bed (if you can call it that way) misplaced and can notice the dirt of the place ... to imagine that here live 5 Human it makes me goosebumps ...

I am a medical student and I love helping people so what Ive achieved to this day (since it does not work just devote myself to my studies) is to cleanse the land and teach them how to eliminate waste and ... do no more pollution than there already ...NEEDS OF Doña Maria and her family:Construction of living adequate housing for Dona Maria and her family ... 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with sewage pipes ... story:
Thank You

The Bluestockings community would like to thank you all for making our campaign such a success, and for helping to fund the renovations our space needs to survive and thrive! As our fundraising campaign has come to a close, we have reached 89% of our $50,000 goal, with $35,970 in Indiegogo contributions and $8,800 in direct donations. 

With the holidays around the corner, we invite you to stop in and check out our literature and gifts! We are open 11am-11pm every day of the week, and our top-selling items can also be found online at http://bluestockings.com/books-and-zines/.

To read more about our campaign, check out the overview below and coverage in The Observer, AM New York, Village Voice, Gothamist, Bowery Boogie, and DNA Info. 

To another 5 years of Bluestockings!

_______________________________________________________________

The Basics

Bluestockings Bookstore and Activist Center, a vital space for sharing feminist and radical political thought, is asking for your help to make our space more welcoming and comfortable for our community. Remodeling our storefront and upgrading our equipment are essential for ensuring Bluestockings will stay open for another five years.

Who We Are

Bluestockings Bookstore and Activist Center is a 100% volunteer-powered and collectively owned radical bookstore, fair trade cafe, and activist center. Bluestockings seeks to empower all people to challenge oppression and participate in creating a society that is equitable, cooperative, and free. We carry a curated selection of titles on topics such as feminism, queer and gender studies, global capitalism, climate & environment, police and prisons, and radical education. We also host accessible by-donation events almost every night to create a community space for for dialogue and education.

We have been open for over 16 years, and we are currently one of only 13 remaining feminist-identified bookstores in the United States and Canada. Our survival is a true testament to the support of and love from our community.

New Lease

For the past several years, Bluestockings has only brought in enough money to cover the cost of keeping our doors open. In fact, no one at Bluestockings is even compensated for their work - our team of over 80 people donate their time and energy to make Bluestockings run.

In June of 2015, Bluestockings signed a new, five-year lease on our storefront at 172 Allen Street. We are thrilled to have secured our space for another five years, but grappling with paying higher rent. As we plan ahead for the next five years, Bluestockings believes that physical renovations to our storefront are vital to meeting demands of an ever-changing publishing industry and expanding our customer base. We are are excited to invest in making much-needed improvements to the space, and are asking for your help to do so.

What We Need 

Bluestockings is asking for donations from our community so we can make the space more welcoming, comfortable, and easy to navigate. Your donation will help us to:

  • Remodel our storefront. This includes remodeling our awning and signage, re-wiring our electrical and lighting system, and refinishing our floor.

  • Update our computers, software, sound, and café equipment. This will improve our capacity to serve customers quickly and complete behind-the-scenes projects more efficiently.

  • Continue to expand our inventory and purchase new items.

Our detailed budget is:
  • $2,500 - License for new point of sale system
  • $3,000 - Transfer to new point of sale system
  • $5,400 - 12 months of new point of sale system software
  • $3,000 - New computers and monitors
  • $4,300 - Basic electrical repair
  • $500 - Repair coffee machine
  • $300 - Replace broken sound equipment
  • $4,000 - Design, production, and installation of a new awning
  • $21,000 - Labor and materials to redo flooring
  • $6,000 - Loss of revenue when closed for flooring construction
  • TOTAL: $50,000

What You'll Get

Check out our perks up top! Our amazing supporter pin and tote designs:


Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways to support Bluestockings' campaign in addition to donating:

  • Get the word out! Forward this page to your friends, family, and any one you think would be interested
  • Buy a book (or a coffee, a notecard, or a tote bag)! We are open at 172 Allen Street from 11 am - 11 pm every day, or you can visit our online store here: http://bluestockings.com/books-and-zines/
  • Volunteer with us! We are entirely run by over 80 volunteers. Come by to fill out a volunteer application.

Thank You!

With your support, Bluestockings will remain in business and thriving for another five years. Thank you for believing in our mission and supporting our community center!

Note:  Bluestockings Bookstore is not a 501c3, and contributions to Bluestockings Bookstore are not tax deductible.

story:
Always wanted to own your own pub? Well, this is the next best thing. 

We’re offering The Internet a chance to become part of the Tatura Hotel. If you contribute to our fund, we'll shamelessly name parts of the pub in your honour. 

Why are you doing this?

Well folks, it’s pretty simple. We've run out cash and the place needs fixing up so this town can have a decent place to have a pot of beer and a chicken parma. We need to get our guest rooms up to standard, fix the balcony and get some better play equipment for the kids. And that's just the start. 

What’s in it for me? 

The more you contribute, the greater the honour. We've written a few perks here on the right- but we're open to suggestions if you want put your name on anything else in the pub. 

Naming a piece of our pub is the perfect gift for weddings, birthdays, bar mitzvahs, baby showers, christmas, hanukkah, wakes, funerals, anniversaries, graduation, veterans day, fathers day, mothers day or Valentine's Day. Nothing says "I love you" like putting her (or his) name on a barstool in a pub in country Victoria. 

IF WE REACH OUR GOAL OF 65K, BUGS IS GOING TO THROW THE BIGGEST BLOODY PARTY TATURA HAS EVER SEEN - AND YOU'RE ALL INVITED!!  

How will I know you’ve really put my name on something? 

Bugs will send you a selfie with your newly-named item.  You can share it with the internet and let your friends know that you’re a part of the furniture at the Tatura Hotel. If that's not enough, the pub is located at 162 Hogan Street,Tatura, Victoria and we'd love you to come and visit. 

How long will my name be on the item? 

Your name will be on the item for a minimum of 24 months. After that time we may take it down, but we'll probably forget to. 

Any legal things you want to tell me? 

If you insist. Having an item named in your honour does not mean that you actually own the item. All items will remain property of The Tatura Hotel.
