story:
CREATE THE IDEAL ONLINE ENVIRONMENT FOR YOUR COMMUNITY

Would you like to do more for your local community and ensure that it has a high-quality online hub? Well so would we.

With Ventown Community Online you can help us build it and be at the forefront of your community's online future in one or more ways:

1.  Donate to help further our community building efforts

2.  Become a community manager

3.  Recommend your community to us

What is Ventown Community Online?

It is a social media hub for local communities: everything in one feed, instantly available, available wherever you go.

It is easy to forget how much of our lives we spend in our communities. Yet, for most locations around the country it is very difficult if not impossible to connect with others in the same community and get relevant content in a single feed.

To remedy this, Ventown has created Community Online. It is the mobile and desktop hub that sorts messages according to specific communities, rather than by friends or followers. You’ll get updates, information, interaction, business and service content, community events, and more from your local community. It is something everyone will engage with and want to use everyday.

Why donate?

Your donation will help ensure that many local communities get a Community Online hub and a community manager.

There’s a goldmine of social and economic opportunity within local community ecosystems that is waiting to be realized with Community Online.

It’s one of the most important ways to get:

More engaged residents

Lower rates of crime

More community organizations

Superior public schools

Better parks, services and public health

More successful small businesses

We’ve created a very powerful social media platform for accessing the broadest range of people and content in any community or cluster of overlapping communities (think Venn diagram) and it’s ready to start connecting people now.

Why get involved as a community manager?

Ventown will provide the platform to communities but we are also looking for community managers who are excited to launch and grow their Community Online audience.

As the community manager you will play a leadership role and foster a much-needed sense of community. Ultimately you will be shaping how your community grows online, enjoy seeing people coming together for the greater good, and feel proud in knowing that its success is because of you.

We have a flexible 10-15 hours per week contractor program that runs in 3-month increments and pays $23 per hour.

We also offer our Partners2000 Program that may be right for you too. The program is a form of social financing that provides referral fees and stock options in certain cases to community managers that want to grow their community quicker and get greater returns.

What are the mechanics?

They work like this: We’ve made it very simple to adopt Community Online. We will train you on how to enter content and how to keep your community active. We’ve created infographics, blogs, videos and other materials to explain Community Online to individuals, communities and businesses —what it is for, how it works, what you’re supposed to do.

We will be there with you as you launch and have regular check-ins with you to see how you’re doing and whether there’s anything we can help with.

We’ll show you how to reach out to community members to grow your audience and how you can work together with other stakeholders that will introduce their audiences to open up a larger set of users.

You’ll ask people to weigh in on issues, share ideas, use the power of the crowd to benefit your community, introduce those in need to those that can help, increase awareness for community events and alerts, use WOMM (word-of-mouth messages) for updates, and bring in local government, businesses, schools and agencies along with their audiences.

Where will content come from?

Community Online is about local content and interaction, which comes from the community itself. Much of the initial content for your community will come from you, your co-community managers, and the people that join early on.

As the audience grows, more and more of the content will come in from the wider community, including residents and families, public agencies, schools, non-profits, business owners, and more - everyone and every group that makes up your community. We can also link in other content channels and information sources (such as news, weather, alerts, etc.)

Ready to become a community manager? Please submit the following:

An email letter/note showcasing your writing skills and explaining why Community Online is a great fit for you

  A resume or simple outline of your relevant experience

  A link to your social media profiles

If you’re passionate about building communities or you know someone that might be a good fit, please let us know.

Ready to recommend your community?

We think the power of the crowdsourcing community is key to launching Community Online so we need your help finding the low hanging fruit.

We want to earn your coverage, ask you to run with it, and share it with your networks.

So send us an email letter/note telling us about your community and getting us excited too. If you are successful, we will provide you and your community with Community Online and find the community manager.

Money, again?

We’ve already invested heavily in building and testing the platform and mobile app.

Your support will help us launch communities and find great community managers.

What better investment could there possibly be than ensuring our communities can pan for gold?

.

story:
The Jim Harvey Second Chance Fund was created to assist with medical expenses for dogs and cats in the Dallas -- Fort Worth area. It is possible that the organization may provide services on a national basis at some time in the future. Both rescues and pet owners are eligible to apply. We need funds to begin operations. We have official 501c3 status from the IRS, so all contributions are tax-deductible.

The Fund is named after the late Jim Harvey of Flower Mound, Texas. Mr. Harvey was a lifelong animal lover whose passion was animal rescue. He conceived the idea of starting this fund about five years ago. However, health problems and his untimely death prevented this from happening. Despite his illness, he held numerous fundraisers for animal rescue and at the time of his death was fostering seven dogs. In addition to his fosters, two of his own dogs, Ginny and Tucker, had been saved from euthanasia and adopted by Mr. Harvey. He had a special fondness for the Jindo breed but all animals were his passion. He made tremendous sacrifices both financially and of his time in order to make sure that these dogs got the very best care. He  He had planned to construct a rescue park on land that he owned, but this dream was not to be realized.

Jim also had seven cats at the time of his death. One of his foster dogs, Libby, was pregnant when he took her in in May of 2011. He helped deliver the babies and found homes for all of them.

Jim had quite a following, both in Texas and around the country. His Facebook pages included one called “Tucker’s Pack” which still exists and is maintained by his friends. This group continues to advocate for animal welfare as well as keep track of his dogs and the lives they have now. This group is very devoted to his memory and works to continue his legacy.


We need start-up funding so that we can begin our work. All funds will go toward grants for pets. There are no operating expenses- all work is done by volunteers.

The guidelines have been created to allow for a wide variety of situations. The organization recognizes that each case is different and we reserve the right to judge each case strictly on its own merits. There are no minimum or maximum amounts of assistance. Applicants may apply more than once if the need is continuing or if a different need arises.

Any grants given to rescue organizations will require them to provide an accounting of the funds spent on each animal. The Jim Harvey Second Chance Fund will also require the rescues to provide documentation of

each animal’s condition and an assessment from the veterinarian who is hired to perform the medical care. It is our intention to do a site visit for each case.

In the case of individuals or families applying for assistance, we will give preference to elderly individuals who are living on a fixed income. The Fund will require that these persons provide documentation of their income. As with the rescues, a report of the condition of each animal, along with photographs, will be required. It is our desire to pay the funds directly to the veterinarian, who will be requested to verify the families’ report of the animal’s condition. We will also require documentation of the condition of the animal once the care has been completed.

The following additional information will be requested of pet owners:

·  financial need and reasons why the owner cannot afford the treatment

·  affirmation that the owner intends to keep the pet

·  conditions in which the pet is being kept

Recognizing the urgency to many of these cases, the Fund will provide the grants expeditiously, acting quickly to verify the information submitted and transfer funds to the veterinary offices.

require them to provide an accounting of the funds spent on each animal. The
Jim Harvey Second Chance Fund will also require the rescues to provide
documentation of 
each animal’s condition and an assessment from the
veterinarian who is hired to perform the medical care. It is our intention to
do a site visit for each case.
In the case of individuals or families applying for assistance,
we will give preference to elderly individuals who are living on a fixed
income. The Fund will require that these persons provide documentation of their
income. As with the rescues, a report of the condition of each animal, along
with photographs, will be required. It is our desire to pay the funds directly
to the veterinarian, who will be requested to verify the families’ report of
the animal’s condition. We will also require documentation of the condition of
the animal once the care has been completed.
The
following additional information will be requested of pet owners:
· 
financial need
and reasons why the owner cannot afford the treatment
· 
affirmation that
the owner intends to keep the pet
· 
conditions in
which the pet is being kept
Recognizing the urgency to many of these cases, the Fund
will provide the grants expeditiously, acting quickly to verify the information
submitted and transfer funds to the veterinary offices.

story:
Klick hier für Deutsch!


We boost your donations: with eco-procurement for charities & pay-raises for everyone!


The International Joint Strategic Procurement Group is a platform which organizes the cost-effective purchase of goods & services for charities and NGOs. By pooling the market- power of more than 50 Austrian organizations, we achieve savings between 30 and 70 percent on things like green electricity, fair-trade coffee, re-use computers, printer-paper and much more. Now we want to scale-up and thus become a social enterprise, needing financial assistance in various areas: funding- & legal fees, public relations, travel costs and last but not least: the internationalization of our model. Help us spread the word!


From an idea to a lighthouse project in two years

Printing paper, electricity, gas, cellphones, insurances, computers, coffee... Just like any company, non-profit organizations have to cover day-to-day expenses. This may sound casual – but in fact, charities and NGOs spend around 20 percent of their budget on these overhead costs. In Austria they sum up to at least 50-100 million Euros a year! That's a lot of money that does not go to the cause that it was originally donated for – and is now saved if the organizations purchase in a joint action.

That's exactly what we are doing, the International Joint Strategic Procurement Group for non-profit organizations. We gather NGOs and charities, negotiate with retailers of goods and services and reach conditions which are usually only granted to big corporations. At the same time we only choose products that are green and ethically responsible – not least because non-profit organizations want to be inspiring examples for society.

Is that working? You can bet! Here are only a few of the savings we already achieved:

  • Eco-friendly printer paper: -64%

  • Fair-trade coffee: -65%

  • Cellphone charges: -40%

  • Green electricity: -30%

  • Re-use computers: up to 70%


We guarantee that these prices go directly to our member organizations – without any hidden payments or commission to the IJSPG. Joining us is basically free, but we are happy to accept voluntary contributions from the non-profit organizations who can afford it. And because this model is convincing, more than 50 organizations have already joined us in Austria. Among them are well-known international charities and NGOs like the WWF, Greenpeace, Amnesty International, Ashoka, SOS Children's Villages or the Red Noses Clowndoctors.


Premium Memberships: up to four-figure eco-pay-raises for our member organizations

Now we enter a critical stage: After running the IJSPG as a voluntary project for two years, it should become a viable social entrepreneurship. Covering funding fees, hiring our first employees, upgrading our website, globalizing our efforts, developing a how-to manual, setting up a decent conference – all this needs to be paid during a time when we actually want to lift off! Right now we have means of our first membership fees and what is left of a 12,000-Euro loan. Each additional Euro would enable us to grow organically and to grand more green savings to non-profit organizations – world wide!

And not only them: in a next step we would like to relieve the employees of our member organizations by offering them our special tariffs for private consumption. In a job sector which is prone to severe underpayment this means a three- to four-figure pay-raise per year and capita – by accessing cheap green electricity, car-sharing, organic food, yoga courses, free giro accounts and much more!

Also companies which are true to their corporate social responsibility will be invited to buy a premium membership for their employees. We will ask them to pay an increased annual fee, so we can allow non-profit organizations a decreased one. The large ones pay more, the small ones less – the IJSPG is reversing the conditions of the market, so that employees will benefit on all sides!

Remember: the more members will join the IJSPG, the bigger its leverage will be for a green and fair economy of the future!


What you will receive for your kind support

You want to help us? Great! And because everyone is benefiting at the IJSPG, you should also get a reward for your contribution. Our member organizations have provided us with some awesome perks: what about a flexible whoop-whoop wristband from the Red Noses Clowndoctors, an organic pepper seed package from Arche Noah, or a keen activist equipment from Greenpeace? Or, for the most generous among you, a 70 percent discount on our premium memberships?

We will be thankful about every contribution – and of course, if you share our campaign, via facebook and twitter!

#UnitedWeSpend

With kind regards

Joachim Schreiber and the team of IJSPG

PS: interested in becoming an IJSPG ambassador and supporting our e-mail campaign? Contact us and receive extra perks – while stocks last!


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Click here for English


Wir steigern deine Spenden: mit Öko-Einkauf für NGOs - und Gehaltserhöhungen für alle


Die Einkaufsgruppe ist eine Beschaffungsplattform, die gemeinnützigen Organisationen den kostengünstigen Einkauf von nachhaltigen Waren und Dienstleistungen ermöglicht. Indem wir die Kaufkraft von über 50 österreichischen NGOs bündeln, erreichen wir Einsparungen zwischen 30 und 70% bei Dingen wie Öko-Strom, Fairtrade-Kaffee, Re-Use-Computern uvm. Nun möchten wir ein Sozialunternehmen werden und benötigen finanzielle Unterstützung in verschiedenen Bereichen: Amtsgebühren, Anwaltskosten, Gehältern, Öffentlichkeitsarbeit, Reisekosten, und der Internationalisierung der Einkaufsgruppe. Hilf uns bei der Gründung!


In zwei Jahren von der Initiative zum Leuchtturmprojekt

Druckerpapier, Strom, Gas, Handy-Tarife, Versicherungen, Computer, Kaffee... Wie jedes Unternehmen haben auch gemeinnützige Organisationen laufende Ausgaben, die sie decken müssen. Das mag beiläufig erscheinen – Tatsache ist jedoch, dass NGOs zwischen 10 und 20% ihres Budgets für diese Nebenkosten ausgeben müssen. In Österreich bewegen sich diese auf mindestens 50 Millionen Euro pro Jahr! Das ist eine Menge Geld, die nicht dem guten Zweck zukommen kann – und die sich einsparen ließe, würden die Organisationen ihre Einkäufe gemeinsam vornehmen.

Genau das tun wir, die Einkaufsgruppe für Charities, NGOs, außeruniversitäre Nonprofit-Forschung und Kulturbetriebe: Wir versammeln gemeinnützige Organisationen hinter uns, treten in Verhandlungen mit LieferantInnen für Waren und Dienstleistungen und erreichen Konditionen, die normalerweise nur großen Unternehmen gewährt werden. Gleichzeitig achten wir dabei genau auf eine sozial-ökologisch nachhaltige Herkunft der Produkte – nicht zuletzt, weil gemeinnützige Organisationen bei ihrer Beschaffung ein Vorbild sein wollen.

Ob sich das rechnet? Und ob! Hier ein Auszug der relativen Einsparungen:

  • Öko-Druckerpapier: -64%

  • Fair Trade-Kaffee: -65%

  • Handy-Tarife: -40%

  • Ökostrom: -30%

  • Re-Use-Computer: -50 bis -70%

Diese Preise werden ausnahmslos an die Organisationen weitergegeben, ohne versteckte Zahlungen oder Provisionen an die Einkaufsgruppe. Die Teilnahme ist grundsätzlich kostenlos, während wir uns über Solidarbeiträge von NGOs freuen, die es sich leisten können.Und weil das überzeugt, sind bereits über 50 Organisationen in Österreich der Einkaufsgruppe beigetreten, darunter der WWF, Greenpeace, Amnesty International, Arche Noah, Bank für Gemeinwohl, SOS Kinderdorf International, Südwind, Vier Pfoten oder die Österreichische Kinderkrebshilfe!


Premium-Mitgliedschaften: bis zu vier-stellige Öko-Gehaltserhöhungen bei unseren Partnerorganisationen!

Nun treten wir jedoch in eine heikle Phase ein: was wir die ersten zwei Jahre als intensives Ehrenamt betrieben haben, soll jetzt ein tragfähiges Gemeinwohlprojekt werden. Amtsgebühren, die ersten Gehälter, die Reisekosten fürs Netzwerken, der Ausbau unserer Öffentlichkeitsarbeit, die Internationalisierung unseres Modells, die Entwicklung eines How-to-Buchs, die erste Pressekonferenz – all das will bezahlt sein, wo wir erst richtig loslegen wollen! Im Moment verfügen wir über den Rest einer bescheidene Förderung in Höhe von 12.000 Euro und die ersten Beiträge unserer Mitglieder. Jeder weitere Euro würde uns die Möglichkeit geben, organisch zu wachsen und noch mehr NGOs nachhaltige Vergünstigungen zu garantieren. Und nicht nur denen:

Im nächsten Schritt wollen wir die MitarbeiterInnen der gemeinnützigen Organisationen entlasten und auch ihnen unsere Sonder-Tarife für den Privatbereich anbieten. In einem Bereich, in dem oft bis zu 30% Unterbezahlung herrscht, bedeutet dies eine steuerfreie, drei- bis vierstellige Gehaltserhöhung pro Kopf und Jahr! Und das in Form von günstigem Ökostrom, Car-Sharing, Food-Coop Bio-Gemüse, Yoga-Kursen, kostenlosen Giro-Konten uvm.

Auch den Beschäftigten von Unternehmen, die ein Zeichen für soziale Personalführung setzen wollen, werden diese “Premium-Mitgliedschaften” offen stehen. Für die Teilnahme bezahlen Unternehmen einen erhöhten Jahresbeitrag, der es uns möglich macht, NGOs einen ermäßigten Jahresbeitrag zu gewähren. Die Großen zahlen mehr, die Kleinen weniger – die Einkaufsgruppe dreht die Marktverhältnisse gekonnt um, während Beschäftigte auf allen Seiten profitieren.


Auf lange Sicht gilt: je mehr Mitglieder die Einkaufsgruppe nutzen, umso stärker wird ihr Hebel und damit ihr Beitrag zu einer sozial-ökologischen Gemeinwohlökonomie!


Was Du von uns bekommst für Deine Unterstützung

Du willst uns mit einem Beitrag helfen? Großartig! Und weil bei uns alle etwas bekommen, kannst Du dich über ein Dankeschön freuen. Unsere Mitglieder haben uns mit tollen Geschenken versorgt: wie wär's mit einem Wahnsinns-Armband von den Roten Nasen? Einem biologischen Saatgut-Paket von der Arche Noah? Einem kreativen AktivistInnen-Training von Greenpeace? Oder, für die großzügigsten unter Euch, der Genuss einer unserer Premium-Mitgliedschaften?

Wir freuen uns über jeden Eurer Beiträge – und natürlich, wenn Ihr unsere Kampagne teilt, über facebook oder twitter!

#UnitedWeSpend

Mit herzlichen Grüßen

Joachim Schreiber und das Team der Einkaufsgruppe

Pssst: Du willst Botschafter für uns werden und unsere Kampagne per E-Mail noch weiter teilen? Dann schreib uns an, wir vergeben extra Geschenke dafür – solange der Vorrat reicht!

story:
Hello, my name is Melvin and I am here to tell you about Northern Virginia Cryotherapy (a sister veteran owned company of Spirit Massage and Bodywork LLC) offering innovative holistic solutions for the Northern Virginia and Washington metropolitan area.  You may have heard of Cryotherapy in the news. It looks likes a futuristic vessels which reaches a cool -264 degrees.  Freezing temperatures send the body into a "survival mode," which causes blood supply to flow to the most vital organs to relay more oxygen and nutrients. Once you leave the cold environment, the enriched and less-toxic blood is flushed back into the rest of the body.

Northern Virginia Cryotherapy offers whole body cryotherapy and in order to open we are launching this campaign called “Cryotherapy: Live Longer and Heal Pain?!” We developed this second location in order to provide our clients with Sports compression treatments, and a wide variety therapeutic and treatment plans to improve your overall health and wellness an upgraded.  We think it will help people in need of a solution for your body’s aches and pains, environmental effects on the body and even sleep and stress issues.

Do you ever think about ways you could get better sleep?

Do you want to feel invigorated and full of energy but don’t know how?

Are you interested in finding relief from muscle and joint pain but don’t know where to turn?

If you answered, “Yes” to any of these questions, you may want to keep reading…

Overview

Dressed in nothing but socks, clogs and mittens, the user will step into the capsule-like machine. Liquid nitrogen is used to cool down the sauna, and, after two to three minutes, skin temperature drops to 32 degrees and one can exit the polar chamber.

Whole-body and localized cryotherapy treatment has become very popular in European and numerous other countries in spas, clinics, medical institutions, and training centers. Beyond the clinical benefits of cold therapy, users generally report the experience as invigorating with improvement in a variety of conditions such as psychological stress, increased energy, improved sleep, and relief from muscle and joint pain. Athletes using the treatments report substantial decreased time for muscle stress recovery. The immediate effect lasts for minutes to hours, and the release of endorphins can have a lasting effect.

The best part: as long as people don’t have an underlying condition that precludes them from exposure to such cold, it has no known side effects.

More about the Project

Did you know? The world's fastest man, Usain Bolt, used a mobile cryosauna at the 2012 London Olympics for relief from a back injury and actor Daniel Craig used whole body cryotherapy to prepare for and maintain his physique for his role in the latest James Bond film, Skyfall and finally Olympic coach and marathon champion Alberto Salazar employed whole body crytherapy when coaching Olympic medalists Galen Ruup and Mo Farah at Nike's Oregon training facility.– This fact prompted us to dig deeper into a solution.  This is where we started to envision “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy” and all the possible benefits we could bring to people:

Reduces inflammation 

Increases energy 

Lessens muscle soreness and tension 

Relieves pain from injuries or joint disorders 

Boosts metabolism and contributes to weight loss 

Increases collagen production, reducing cellulite and signs of aging 

Improves mood via a rise in endorphins 

Has an anti-oxide effect, which can slow aging and help prevent osteoporosis 

Has also been used to help elevate testosterone levels in men 

Supports the treatment of multiple sclerosis 

Helps solve insomnia, migraines, gout and asthma 

When reviewing these benefits, features and much more, it inspired and assured us that this is a second location and service that needs to be created. We feel if executed properly we can reach a large market of people in need of an easier way to live.  Our features will make us incredibly qualified to succeed in the industry.  This paired with attention to detail and quality service will make us a key player if not leader in the industry. Our mission is to take care of every funder, supporter and customer with the upmost respect and care.  We feel this will be the key to our growth.

About Us

This project really hits home for me because as a cancer survivor and veteran who has dedicated his life in the pursuit to help others. I have researched many traditional and unconventional therapies. Most therapies have no scientific merit. Everyone is familiar with ICY HOT in the pursuit to achieve temporary relief from pain. I experienced 1st hand in Dallas at CryoUSA the potential of WBC. I became a massage therapist for all of the above reasons.

I'm originally from Beaumont, TX. Southern raised veteran who served in Afghanistan who still believes this world would be a better place if everyone took the time to help one another.  And that is really why I am opening this location.  During 2013, I was diagnosed with Non Hodgkins' lymphoma. 

I received my remission last November after about 8 months of aggressive chemotherapy. During and after my treatments, I discovered a bad side effect from one of the drugs, Oncospar. It causes peripheral neuropathy at the bottom of your feet and palms of the hands. I began to research with Google searches over the scientific websites like NIH for any known cures. They were none listed. If someone looses too much sensation from their nerve endings, it can drastically cause a loss of motor functions to your hands and feet. For example, you won't be able to even button your shirt. Well, I thought about it and I figured that I could either be a victim or do something about it. I tried playing the guitar and it worked for my hands for a while but nothing but Reflexology worked temporarily on my feet, so I did some more homework and found out about Whole Body Cryotherapy assisting folks with neurological damage. I figured since I was traveling to TX to visit family I would give it a test run in Dallas. I was a bit skeptical until 48 hours out the chamber. I started gaining more sensation in my feet. Prior to my 2 treatments, my feet felt like 4 pair of socks.

As you can see from my story, this location is not only opening as a business venture but out of necessity.  I even have friends who suffer from skin conditions and diabetes who I know could benefit from these treatments. My company is nested in the neighborhood for a reason, My motto is a veteran owned company serving the community. I don't want crowdfunding to just purchase new equipment. I'm on a mission to aid the local communities medical and military alike.

How You Can Help

For us to bring the “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy” to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy”.  We will also use our funding to test our concept to make it better.  We are committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best possible solutions.

We will also be using the funding to: 

Expand the possibilities for the usage for consumers as well as enterprise solutions of the “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy”

Further customize the first version of the “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy” 

Create additional products and services that will compliment “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy”

The “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy” needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!

How We'll Use the Funds

We need about $250K in order to break “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy” onto the market. That will includes marketing, materials, labor and related expenses for start-up. 

Final Thank You and Links

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy” family.

If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!

If you wish to contact us:

Website: http://www.cryocave.com

Our Social Media Connections:

Instagram: cryocave

Twitter:  @cryocave

Facebook: facebook.com/cryocave

YouTube:  youtube.com/.cryocave.com

Contact Information

Name: Melvin W.

Phone Number:  877987.3529

E Mail: support@cryocave.com

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at support@cryocave.com
story_txt:
Hello, my name is Melvin and I am here to tell you about Northern Virginia Cryotherapy (a sister veteran owned company of Spirit Massage and Bodywork LLC) offering innovative holistic solutions for the Northern Virginia and Washington metropolitan area.  You may have heard of Cryotherapy in the news. It looks likes a futuristic vessels which reaches a cool -264 degrees.  Freezing temperatures send the body into a "survival mode," which causes blood supply to flow to the most vital organs to relay more oxygen and nutrients. Once you leave the cold environment, the enriched and less-toxic blood is flushed back into the rest of the body.
Northern Virginia Cryotherapy offers whole body cryotherapy and in order to open we are launching this campaign called “Cryotherapy: Live Longer and Heal Pain?!” We developed this second location in order to provide our clients with Sports compression treatments, and a wide variety therapeutic and treatment plans to improve your overall health and wellness an upgraded.  We think it will help people in need of a solution for your body’s aches and pains, environmental effects on the body and even sleep and stress issues.
Do you ever think about ways you could get better sleep?
Do you want to feel invigorated and full of energy but don’t know how?
Are you interested in finding relief from muscle and joint pain but don’t know where to turn?
If you answered, “Yes” to any of these questions, you may want to keep reading…
Overview
Dressed in nothing but socks, clogs and mittens, the user will step into the capsule-like machine. Liquid nitrogen is used to cool down the sauna, and, after two to three minutes, skin temperature drops to 32 degrees and one can exit the polar chamber.
Whole-body and localized cryotherapy treatment has become very popular in European and numerous other countries in spas, clinics, medical institutions, and training centers. Beyond the clinical benefits of cold therapy, users generally report the experience as invigorating with improvement in a variety of conditions such as psychological stress, increased energy, improved sleep, and relief from muscle and joint pain. Athletes using the treatments report substantial decreased time for muscle stress recovery. The immediate effect lasts for minutes to hours, and the release of endorphins can have a lasting effect.
The best part: as long as people don’t have an underlying condition that precludes them from exposure to such cold, it has no known side effects.
More about the Project
Did you know? The world's fastest man, Usain Bolt, used a mobile cryosauna at the 2012 London Olympics for relief from a back injury and actor Daniel Craig used whole body cryotherapy to prepare for and maintain his physique for his role in the latest James Bond film, Skyfall and finally Olympic coach and marathon champion Alberto Salazar employed whole body crytherapy when coaching Olympic medalists Galen Ruup and Mo Farah at Nike's Oregon training facility.– This fact prompted us to dig deeper into a solution.  This is where we started to envision “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy” and all the possible benefits we could bring to people:
Reduces inflammation 
Increases energy 
Lessens muscle soreness and tension 
Relieves pain from injuries or joint disorders 
Boosts metabolism and contributes to weight loss 
Increases collagen production, reducing cellulite and signs of aging 
Improves mood via a rise in endorphins 
Has an anti-oxide effect, which can slow aging and help prevent osteoporosis 
Has also been used to help elevate testosterone levels in men 
Supports the treatment of multiple sclerosis 
Helps solve insomnia, migraines, gout and asthma 
When reviewing these benefits, features and much more, it inspired and assured us that this is a second location and service that needs to be created. We feel if executed properly we can reach a large market of people in need of an easier way to live.  Our features will make us incredibly qualified to succeed in the industry.  This paired with attention to detail and quality service will make us a key player if not leader in the industry. Our mission is to take care of every funder, supporter and customer with the upmost respect and care.  We feel this will be the key to our growth.
About Us
This project really hits home for me because as a cancer survivor and veteran who has dedicated his life in the pursuit to help others. I have researched many traditional and unconventional therapies. Most therapies have no scientific merit. Everyone is familiar with ICY HOT in the pursuit to achieve temporary relief from pain. I experienced 1st hand in Dallas at CryoUSA the potential of WBC. I became a massage therapist for all of the above reasons.
I'm originally from Beaumont, TX. Southern raised veteran who served in Afghanistan who still believes this world would be a better place if everyone took the time to help one another.  And that is really why I am opening this location.  During 2013, I was diagnosed with Non Hodgkins' lymphoma. 
I received my remission last November after about 8 months of aggressive chemotherapy. During and after my treatments, I discovered a bad side effect from one of the drugs, Oncospar. It causes peripheral neuropathy at the bottom of your feet and palms of the hands. I began to research with Google searches over the scientific websites like NIH for any known cures. They were none listed. If someone looses too much sensation from their nerve endings, it can drastically cause a loss of motor functions to your hands and feet. For example, you won't be able to even button your shirt. Well, I thought about it and I figured that I could either be a victim or do something about it. I tried playing the guitar and it worked for my hands for a while but nothing but Reflexology worked temporarily on my feet, so I did some more homework and found out about Whole Body Cryotherapy assisting folks with neurological damage. I figured since I was traveling to TX to visit family I would give it a test run in Dallas. I was a bit skeptical until 48 hours out the chamber. I started gaining more sensation in my feet. Prior to my 2 treatments, my feet felt like 4 pair of socks.
As you can see from my story, this location is not only opening as a business venture but out of necessity.  I even have friends who suffer from skin conditions and diabetes who I know could benefit from these treatments. My company is nested in the neighborhood for a reason, My motto is a veteran owned company serving the community. I don't want crowdfunding to just purchase new equipment. I'm on a mission to aid the local communities medical and military alike.
How You Can Help
For us to bring the “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy” to life, we need your support!
Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy”.  We will also use our funding to test our concept to make it better.  We are committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best possible solutions.
We will also be using the funding to: 
Expand the possibilities for the usage for consumers as well as enterprise solutions of the “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy”
Further customize the first version of the “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy” 
Create additional products and services that will compliment “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy”
The “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy” needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!
How We'll Use the Funds
We need about $250K in order to break “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy” onto the market. That will includes marketing, materials, labor and related expenses for start-up. 
Final Thank You and Links
We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “Northern Virginia Cryotherapy” family.

story:
Short Summary

São Tomé e Príncipe's rainy season lasts for 6 months but for another 6 months the Island suffers from lack of water for basic sanitation and agriculture. 

JOCUM is a christian moved organization aiming to contribute for communitary development, improving life and education conditions of children and youngsters in São Tomé. 

What We Need & What You Get

We have already set a working school with 200 children and now we wish to better equip it with a water tank enabling water supply for hygiene care, cooking and agriculture within the facilities, throughout the 6 months of dry season.

Feel the positive impact of contributing  for a better future in these kids lives. Check out the perks they have to offer you for their gratitude.

The Impact

Building a water tank will provide this School in the region of Melhorada various upgrades, namely:

Water during the dry season, a very important need given that the dry season lasts for 6 months in São Tomé and so the tank would recollect and redistribute the water from the rainy season, making this facility self sustainable and environment-friendly.

Basic sanitation which will improve hygiene conditions and habits as well as the risk prevention  of contagious diseases due namely to the existent poor equipments.  

Agriculture and Food by creating a self sustainable water distributing device the School will be able to plant, grow its own products and cook a more varied and healthy diet for the children attending the school.

story:
Hi everyone!

This is Lizz with her two dogs: Roberta and JZ. Lizz got evicted from her apartment so she is currently living with her two dogs in Central Park and sits near 72nd and Broadway. She had an option to put both of her dogs into a shelter but she decided not to. Shelters are often not the best places for dogs (especially Pitts) and Roberta and JZ are deeply attached to Lizz. 

So, with your contribution, we are trying to gather a few month's worth of rent for these three amazing souls, so that they can get out of NYC and start all over again. We are trying to move her to Puerto Rico, where she has friends and can start all over with a low rent house and a big backyard for the dogs.

Also, Lizz would like to donate more than a third of everything that is collected to homeless people of color, physically handicapped, women and with dogs. She believes that even while living on the streets, her privileges have been great. She acknowledges that fact that other people are more disadvantaged than her, and would like to make her own contribution for it!

I know that there are hundreds of stories like this one in New York City. It is a fast and demanding city that does not take any prisoners. But here's one of them and here's the chance for you to do something about it.

When I was walking past them, Lizz was giving Roberta kisses and hugs. Sometimes, even the kindest and best people need a little help! :)

To be human, is to be humane xx Thank you :)

story:
Help Us Raise $50,000!

We are trying to raise $50,000 by October 30th, to help sustain and grow the PlayGarden and its programs. Your contributions will help:

  • Ensure access for All, regardless of family income.

  • Enable us to provide our wonderful inclusive programs to the whole community.

  • Keep our gardens lush and thriving.

Not just a Seattle neighborhood resource, the PlayGarden draws families from as far away as Gig Harbor and Wenatchee! Your investment in the PlayGarden will pay off in access to play for families all over the state.

In recognition of your commitment, we are offering a range of tangible thanks including handmade gifts from PlayGarden kids to special private gatherings with author Sherman Alexie or world renowned sound artist Trimpin.

What is the PlayGarden?

Seattle Children’s PlayGarden is a public garden and play space designed for children with special needs. Covering an acre of land in south central Seattle, the PlayGarden was created in 2002 as an outdoor, inclusive place for all kids  to play their way – kids on two feet, kids with walkers, kids in wheelchairs and kids who communicate differently.  It’s a place where children of all abilities are free to follow their imaginations, wherever they may lead, and engage in the most important work of childhood:  Play.  From the top of our Mt. Jordan to the natural wonderland of the Wild Zone, the PlayGarden is a place where magic happens daily

Accessibility and equality are at the heart of the PlayGarden’s mission.


We work tirelessly to ensure that our garden and our programs are accessible to a broad range of underserved populations including families with special needs children, low-income families, and families of color. Located in an ethnically and economically diverse neighborhood, the PlayGarden is a tremendous resource for the immediate community, who frequently come here to play, enjoy the garden, and meet their neighbors. Conveniently located near I-90 and I-5, families of all shapes, sizes, and abilities come from all over the greater Seattle area to explore, play, and learn together. 

We are truly A Garden for Everyone!

Your contributions will help support the PlayGarden and its programs throughout the year.

Life for families with disabled children is extraordinarily expensive and can be an isolating experience. The PlayGarden provides a place of respite for parents and a consistent, year-round place for children with disabilities to develop artistically, physically, and socially - all alongside their typically developing siblings and friends.

Why support the PlayGarden?

  • Because you believe that we are all better; more compassionate, more innovative, and more open-minded when we are ALL included.
  • Because you believe that ALL children deserve space to PLAY.
  • Because all children deserve to share the same classrooms, playgrounds, and high expectations.

Like a garden, children need consistent care, sun, water, and fresh air to grow. But, to truly thrive, children need PLAY. Show your support for “equal play for every body” by donating today!

Celebrating Diversity


Seattle Children’s PlayGarden provides one of the only spaces in Seattle where special needs kids and their typically developing siblings and friends can play together, unencumbered by the challenges and obstacles found in standard city playgrounds and parks. This shouldn’t be a revolutionary concept, but it is – while other Seattle playgrounds may be ADA compliant, every aspect of the PlayGarden has been designed with inclusion in mind. 

In addition, the PlayGarden provides significant tuition assistance for its wide range of programming; understanding that many special needs families are struggling to pay ever-increasing medical costs. The PlayGarden also benefits the entire Seattle community, serving as a treasured public park outside of program hours. Please support this vital community asset.

A Trusted Public Partner

Since its inception, Seattle Children's PlayGarden has partnered with the City of Seattle to rehabilitate Colman Playfield and offer affordable, accessible programming and play to kids of all abilities. The PlayGarden is a registered 501 (c)3 and prides itself on maintaining a reputation of transparency and accountability.

Your donation is tax-deductible. For more information about the PlayGarden, please visit our website or Facebook page

Spread the Word!

Want to help get the word out about the PlayGarden?

  • Please share our campaign with your social networks!
  • Sign up for our newsletter and find out about upcoming events!

Thank you so much for helping our (Play)Garden grow!

story:
What is Skybeam™?

Skybeam™ is the most effective way for businesses to continuously display dynamic web content on big screen TV’s and monitors. Use any HDTV as web-connected digital signage with a simple cloud based interface and open API.  Built for businesses to unlock the potential of their cloud data, once you set up your Skybeam™ Receiver you will never have to think about managing your data viewing experience again.

The Skybeam™ Receiver plugs directly into the back of your HDTV or Monitor via HDMI and uses your wired or wireless network to instantly displays any webpage you point it to. It really is that simple.  Watch our campaign video to learn how easy it is to setup Skybeam.

What can I display with Skybeam™?

Skybeam™ can display anything you can show in a web browser, here are a few examples of what you can use Skybeam™ to permanently display:

Business Intelligence dashboards:

  • Cyfe
  • DOMO
  • Geckoboard
  • Klipfolio
  • Leftronic
  • And more!

Multimedia installations:

  • Photo slideshows
  • Digital artwork
  • Looping video
  • Custom HTML5/CSS3/Javascript

Informational displays & kiosks:

  • Real-time calendars & schedules (web powered)
  • Live news feeds
  • Alerts & notifications
  • Status boards
  • Social media dashbaords

Restaurant menu boards & retail signage:

  • Static images
  • Custom webpages 
  • Combine static & live content!

Digital marketing & signage:

  • Image slideshows
  • Custom webpages
  • Live and/or static content
  • Looping HD videos
  • Direct integration with your web marketing platforms


Why Skybeam™?

We built Skybeam™ because we were frustrated with constantly managing temporary solutions for getting web content on TV’s. Consumer streaming devices like Chromecast or Apple TV are not designed to continuously display a single source, they get knocked off-line or go idle when the smartphone or computer leaves the office. Using a dedicated PC requires constant maintenance and carries with it hundreds to thousands of dollars in hidden maintenance and management costs annually.


Skybeam™ breaks this mold by providing a truly turn-key, zero maintenance solution. Set it up once and our technology will disappear into the background allowing your web content to take center stage. The Skybeam™ Receiver functions like an appliance, just add power and the internet and your content will be consistently available. It is the first always-on, always-ready internet appliance designed to display web content 24/7.

Watch our original campaign video to learn more:


Hardware

The Skybeam™ Receiver is a custom solution built on top of the incredibly capable Intel Compute Stick platform. This bespoke solution is capable of displaying anything the web can throw at it, from HTML5 and CSS3 to intensive Javascript visualizations and HD Video. All of your content will be displayed flawlessly on the big screen. 


Web Service

The Skybeam™ web service is the glue that connects your web content with your Skybeam™ Receiver. It is a self-service web portal that allows you to configure all of your Permanent Screen™ from a single location. It is as simple as registering your device and copy/pasting the URL you want to display. As we grow, we will continue to add features to the Skybeam™ service. Options like content schedules and real-time monitoring will be rolling out in Q4 of this year.


API and Developer Community 

We haven't stopped there, we are working on a public API that will allow 3rd party developers to directly connect your services with your screens through the Skybeam™ web service. The Skybeam™ platform is enabling an entirely new way for businesses to interact with their cloud data. By permanently displaying your cloud services on dedicated screens your data is no longer lost in a browser tab or buried in your inbox. The Permanent Screen™ view will enable developers to give new meaning to the service they provide to their customers.


Timeline


Skybeam™ News

Skybeam™ was recently selected by and competed in the Techweek Chicago Launch competition. The product was received with excitement by the startup community and big business alike. Judges graded us highly on our product fit and competitive edge, going to show that every savvy business needs a Skybeam™ Receiver.

Perks

$10+ | Thank You! 

You will get a big thank you (and hug) from our team if we ever meet you, as well as your social media link of choice listed next to your name on our permanent Indiegogo supporters "Thank You" page on our website.


$25 | Limited Edition Skybeam™ Coffee Mug 

Premium 16oz Coffee Mug - Only for Indiegogo supporters. You can add increments of $25 to any backer level to get extra mugs!


$50 | Limited Edition Skybeam™ T-Shirt

Ultra-premium American Apparel Skybeam™ T-Shirt. Show off your support in style and comfort!


$100 | Mug + T-Shirt

Get one premium 16oz Coffee Mug and Skybeam™ T-Shirt.


$245 | Skybeam™ Receiver ($195 Early Bird!)

Receive one Skybeam™ Receiver to put the web on your wall.  The first 75 will receive special early bird pricing, the best value you will ever see on the Skybeam Receiver! Get them now for an incredible deal! Retail price will be $295 USD.


$495 | Skybeam™ Receiver + Lifetime Service ($395 Early Bird!)
This is unprecedented value. Not only will you receive a Skybeam™ Receiver at an incredible value, you will never have to pay a monthly fee for service!  This level includes lifetime standard Skybeam™ service for your Skybeam™ Receiver.  Retail value is $295 for the receiver + $500 for lifetime service = $795 total value!


$545 | EARLY ADOPTER Skybeam™ Receiver + Lifetime Service

This level is for those who need Skybeam™ and they need it NOW!  You will receive one of the first 50 Skybeam™ Receivers off the line.  This is the most helpful level of support for us, if you see the value Skybeam™ will bring to your business make sure you get your hands on one of the first 50!



$1175 | Skybeam™ Receiver 5-Pack

This level includes 5 Skybeam™ Receivers to get your business up and running. 


$2375 | Skybeam™ Receiver + Lifetime Service 5-Pack

This level includes 5 Skybeam™ Receivers and includes lifetime service for each of those receivers. Get your business up and running without any monthly fees!


$2475 | Skybeam™ Receiver x 11

Turn it up to 11!  This level includes 11 Skybeam™ Receivers to get your business up and running at scale!


$4950 | Skybeam™ Receiver + Lifetime Service x 11

Turn it up to 11 for LIFE! This level includes 11 Skybeam™ Receivers AND lifetime service for each of those receivers. Your business will be up and running without monthly fees at scale!


$9,945 | Skybeam™ Custom Display Wall + KPI Consulting and Setup

A member of our team will come to you and help you build a 4-screen display wall (or 4 independent screens). We will help you get all of your businesses actionable metrics on display for employees to make smarter business decisions. We will help you define your KPI's and configure your business dashboards. We provide the Skybeam™ Receivers and you provide the HDTV's. A member of our team will come to your business and spend 2 days helping your company make more informed decisions. We will help you select a business dashboard service based on your data sources and implement your Permanent Screen™ using Skybeam™.

*Includes travel within the United States only. International backers will be required to provide transportation and lodging to our team members separate from this pledge.



Perks Matrix

F.A.Q.

Q: Why Indiegogo?

A: Crowdfunding is still relatively uncommon for business oriented products and we get the question all the time “Why Indiegogo?” The answer is simple, we believe that Indiegogo is the ideal place to reach the millions of small businesses who can benefit from our product.  After all, you just need a credit or debit card to back us on Indiegogo and support a growing business whose mission is to help your business make more informed decisions, increasing your bottom line.

Q: Are there special considerations for a business backing a Indiegogo campaign?

A: Nope!  Businesses can back Indiegogo projects just like individuals. All you need is a credit card and a email address.  We don't think businesses should be left out of the amazing community of forward thinkers here on Indiegogo.  Business supporting business just makes sense!

Q: Is Skybeam™ just for businesses?

A: Why of course not!  Just because Skybeam™ is a business class product does not mean that individuals can’t take advantage of putting their data (or even family memories) on the big screen. Skybeam™ is built with business services in mind and our current integrations are business focused. That being said, since Skybeam™ can display anything the web can throw at it, the possibilities are almost endless as to what you can display with Skybeam™.

Q: Why is Skybeam™ more expensive than consumer streaming devices?  

A: In order to ensure that our product was truly business class and capable of displaying all of the web, we needed to choose high-performance hardware that holds-up to the rigor of 24/7 use and will seamlessly display the high-demand content you will throw at it. This means that our hardware is more expensive than typical consumer grade devices.

Q: Why is there a monthly service cost?

A: The Skybeam™  Receiver is tightly integrated with the Skybeam™ web service which is a requirement for operation.  Your Skybeam™ Receiver is constantly connected to the Skybeam™ web service which allows us to provide the growing number of platform features in real-time.  This level of service is part of why Skybeam™ is a business class device.  Running this service costs money and the developers that are working to constantly improve and ensure the reliability of the platform like to eat too. This monthly service cost enables us to provide you with a world class product and meet the demands of your business today and in the future.

Q: What is the cost of the Skybeam™ service?

A: The Skybeam™ Receiver requires a service plan for operation.  Our standard service plan will be $12/mo per Receiver at launch with discounts for purchasing 6-month or 1-year plans.  Each Indiegogo supporter will be provided 6 months of free Standard Service with their Skybeam™ Receiver Reward.

Q: What does “Lifetime Service” mean?

A: If you back us at a level where “Lifetime Service” is one of the rewards, you will receive a Lifetime service plan for the devices you receive as your reward. This lifetime service plan is an Indiegogo exclusive, we will never offer this deep of a discount after the completion of the Indiegogo campaign. Lifetime service will provide the Standard Skybeam™ Service Plan for the lifetime of the device or product offering, whichever is less. The retail price for Standard Lifetime Service will be $500 after the Indiegogo Campaign. 

Q: How does my Skybeam™ Receiver connect to the internet?

A: Your Skybeam™ Receiver connects to the internet through your local network using one of two methods. You can either utilize the included ethernet adapter and use a wired connection (suggested) OR you can connect you Skybeam™ Receiver to your network via WiFi.

Q: How fast should my internet connection be to run Skybeam™?

A: Skybeam™ responds to the web the same way that your browser does on your computer.  If you can confidently display your web content on your computer, Skybeam™ will perform similarly.  Bandwidth requirements will be dependent on the type of content you are displaying. Static images and simple web pages will have small bandwidth footprints, while real-time tickers and streaming video content will require much greater bandwidth.

Q: Can I use a cellular data service with Skybeam™?

A: Direct cellular data support is on the product roadmap for Q1 2016.  Today Skybeam™ works with any cellular hotspot or modem that can connect to the Skybeam™ over WiFi or Ethernet. Please see the note on “What type of internet connection do I need to run Skybeam™?”  about bandwidth requirements as these are more of a concern over cellular connections.

Q: How secure is Skybeam™?

A: Skybeam™ utilizes the same security measures that the leading banking institutions use to secure your financial transactions. We strive to keep your business and personal data as safe as possible by following industry standards. You should keep in mind that Skybeam™ is a method for getting your data on big screens over the internet and we have no influence on the security of your original data sources or the location in which you display that data. We will do our best to work with 3rd party data providers to encourage them to follow best practices as well.

Q: Can I request multiple Mugs or T-Shirts?

A: Absolutely!  Just add multiples of $30 for mugs or $50 for T-Shirts to your pledge amount. You will receive a survey at the end of the campaign where you can specify quantities and sizes.

Q: Can Skybeam™ display locally hosted content?

A: Yes. Skybeam™ can display any web content that can be accessed from the network it is connected to. This may require some more advanced setup and working with your IT department or network specialist is encouraged.


Risks and challenges:

Our team has been involved in businesses providing B2B hardware products for the last 10 years, managing the full product cycle from product development to manufacturing and fulfillment. We have considerable experience working with contract manufacturers in the US and abroad to deliver products that meet and exceed customer expectation. That being said, there is always uncertainty when it comes to manufacturing and electronics, component availability, pricing and yield are always concerns. Fortunately we are working with industry veterans who have provided products reliably for years. We will do everything in our power to deliver on the goals of this Indiegogo campaign. There is always the chance that we may have to make component substitutions, but we will never sacrifice performance or user experience. We will keep all of our backers updated throughout the process and they will be the first to be informed of any challenges that may arise. You supported us and we will support you. Thank you for supporting Skybeam!!


Trademark Disclaimers:

Intel and the Intel logo are trademarks of Intel Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries. All product and company names are trademarks™ or registered® trademarks of their respective holders. Use of them does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by them.

Skybeam™ and Permanent Screen™  are registered trademark of Skybeam LLC.
story_txt:
What is Skybeam™?
Skybeam™ is the most effective way for businesses to continuously display dynamic web content on big screen TV’s and monitors. Use any HDTV as web-connected digital signage with a simple cloud based interface and open API.  Built for businesses to unlock the potential of their cloud data, once you set up your Skybeam™ Receiver you will never have to think about managing your data viewing experience again.

The Skybeam™ Receiver plugs directly into the back of your HDTV or Monitor via HDMI and uses your wired or wireless network to instantly displays any webpage you point it to. It really is that simple.  Watch our campaign video to learn how easy it is to setup Skybeam.What can I display with Skybeam™?
Skybeam™ can display anything you can show in a web browser, here are a few examples of what you can use Skybeam™ to permanently display:

Business Intelligence dashboards:


Cyfe
DOMO
Geckoboard
Klipfolio
Leftronic
And more!

Multimedia installations:



Photo slideshows
Digital artwork
Looping video
Custom HTML5/CSS3/Javascript

Informational displays & kiosks:



Real-time calendars & schedules (web powered)
Live news feeds
Alerts & notifications
Status boards
Social media dashbaords

Restaurant menu boards & retail signage:



Static images
Custom webpages 
Combine static & live content!

Digital marketing & signage:


Image slideshows
Custom webpages
Live and/or static content
Looping HD videos
Direct integration with your web marketing platforms


Why Skybeam™?
We built Skybeam™ because we were frustrated with constantly managing temporary solutions for getting web content on TV’s. Consumer streaming devices like Chromecast or Apple TV are not designed to continuously display a single source, they get knocked off-line or go idle when the smartphone or computer leaves the office. Using a dedicated PC requires constant maintenance and carries with it hundreds to thousands of dollars in hidden maintenance and management costs annually.

Skybeam™ breaks this mold by providing a truly turn-key, zero maintenance solution. Set it up once and our technology will disappear into the background allowing your web content to take center stage. The Skybeam™ Receiver functions like an appliance, just add power and the internet and your content will be consistently available. It is the first always-on, always-ready internet appliance designed to display web content 24/7.Watch our original campaign video to learn more:


Hardware
The Skybeam™ Receiver is a custom solution built on top of the incredibly capable Intel Compute Stick platform. This bespoke solution is capable of displaying anything the web can throw at it, from HTML5 and CSS3 to intensive Javascript visualizations and HD Video. All of your content will be displayed flawlessly on the big screen. 

Web Service
The Skybeam™ web service is the glue that connects your web content with your Skybeam™ Receiver. It is a self-service web portal that allows you to configure all of your Permanent Screen™ from a single location. It is as simple as registering your device and copy/pasting the URL you want to display. As we grow, we will continue to add features to the Skybeam™ service. Options like content schedules and real-time monitoring will be rolling out in Q4 of this year.
API and Developer Community We haven't stopped there, we are working on a public API that will allow 3rd party developers to directly connect your services with your screens through the Skybeam™ web service. The Skybeam™ platform is enabling an entirely new way for businesses to interact with their cloud data. By permanently displaying your cloud services on dedicated screens your data is no longer lost in a browser tab or buried in your inbox. The Permanent Screen™ view will enable developers to give new meaning to the service they provide to their customers.TimelineSkybeam™ News
Skybeam™ was recently selected by and competed in the Techweek Chicago Launch competition. The product was received with excitement by the startup community and big business alike. Judges graded us highly on our product fit and competitive edge, going to show that every savvy business needs a Skybeam™ Receiver.

Perks
$10+ | Thank You! 
You will get a big thank you (and hug) from our team if we ever meet you, as well as your social media link of choice listed next to your name on our permanent Indiegogo supporters "Thank You" page on our website.
$25 | Limited Edition Skybeam™ Coffee Mug 
Premium 16oz Coffee Mug - Only for Indiegogo supporters. You can add increments of $25 to any backer level to get extra mugs!

$50 | Limited Edition Skybeam™ T-Shirt
Ultra-premium American Apparel Skybeam™ T-Shirt. Show off your support in style and comfort!


$100 | Mug + T-Shirt
Get one premium 16oz Coffee Mug and Skybeam™ T-Shirt.

$245 | Skybeam™ Receiver ($195 Early Bird!)

Receive one Skybeam™ Receiver to put the web on your wall.  The first 75 will receive special early bird pricing, the best value you will ever see on the Skybeam Receiver! Get them now for an incredible deal! Retail price will be $295 USD.
$495 | Skybeam™ Receiver + Lifetime Service ($395 Early Bird!)This is unprecedented value. Not only will you receive a Skybeam™ Receiver at an incredible value, you will never have to pay a monthly fee for service!  This level includes lifetime standard Skybeam™ service for your Skybeam™ Receiver.  Retail value is $295 for the receiver + $500 for lifetime service = $795 total value!$545 | EARLY ADOPTER Skybeam™ Receiver + Lifetime ServiceThis level is for those who need Skybeam™ and they need it NOW!  You will receive one of the first 50 Skybeam™ Receivers off the line.  This is the most helpful level of support for us, if you see the value Skybeam™ will bring to your business make sure you get your hands on one of the first 50!$1175 | Skybeam™ Receiver 5-PackThis level includes 5 Skybeam™ Receivers to get your business up and running. $2375 | Skybeam™ Receiver + Lifetime Service 5-PackThis level includes 5 Skybeam™ Receivers and includes lifetime service for each of those receivers. Get your business up and running without any monthly fees!$2475 | Skybeam™ Receiver x 11Turn it up to 11!  This level includes 11 Skybeam™ Receivers to get your business up and running at scale!$4950 | Skybeam™ Receiver + Lifetime Service x 11Turn it up to 11 for LIFE! This level includes 11 Skybeam™ Receivers AND lifetime service for each of those receivers. Your business will be up and running without monthly fees at scale!$9,945 | Skybeam™ Custom Display Wall + KPI Consulting and SetupA member of our team will come to you and help you build a 4-screen display wall (or 4 independent screens). We will help you get all of your businesses actionable metrics on display for employees to make smarter business decisions. We will help you define your KPI's and configure your business dashboards. We provide the Skybeam™ Receivers and you provide the HDTV's. A member of our team will come to your business and spend 2 days helping your company make more informed decisions. We will help you select a business dashboard service based on your data sources and implement your Permanent Screen™ using Skybeam™.*Includes travel within the United States only. story:
Short Summary

Publishing suffers from a major diversity problem. Statistics show that the vast majority of books published are by white authors and about white characters. Part of the problem is that the majority of the staff behind the scenes, including publishers’ employees and reviewers, is also white. When almost all of the gatekeepers and decision-makers are white, it is no wonder that on average only 10% of children’s books published each year are by or about people of color.

For decades there has been overwhelming agreement in the industry that there should be more diversity at all levels in the book world, but the problem never seems to go away. Where do we even start?

If we are serious about trying to address the lack of diversity in the publishing world, creating Ubuntu Press is but one first step we need to take. Sharing our numbers as an industry will not only clue us in to important patterns that we may be missing, it will also show that we are committed to change.

In the past, publishers have usually put the responsibility on readers for the lack of diverse representation in books. The extremely dated adage that “diverse books do not sell” has become a belief that has reached mythical proportions. While it’s important for readers to support diverse books with their dollars and voices, it’s equally important for publishers to self-reflect on how they can do better on their end. We must acknowledge that one factor contributing to the lack of diverse books is the lack of diversity among the people who edit, market, review, and sell the books.

The goal of Ubuntu Press is to serve as editor, marketer, reviewer, and seller of books from often marginalized communities which is inclusive of genre, gender, race/ethnicity, sexual orientation, disability. To facilitate writer, poets, and artist who would like to pursue self-publishing their work. Ultimately, Ubuntu Press aims to increase diverse books in the children’s and adult book world.

Through your support and participation in this campaign we can work together to put in place sustainable programs that will increase diversity among publishing staffs in the long-term. Together, we can create a more inclusive book publishing industry.

“Ubuntu [...] speaks of the very essence of being human. [We] say [...] "Hey, so-and-so has ubuntu." Then you are generous, you are hospitable, you are friendly and caring and compassionate. You share what you have. It is to say, "My humanity is caught up, is inextricably bound up, in yours." We belong in a bundle of life. We say, "A person is a person through other persons."

[...] A person with ubuntu is open and available to others, affirming of others, does not feel threatened that others are able and good, for he or she has a proper self-assurance that comes from knowing that he or she belongs in a greater whole and is diminished when others are humiliated or diminished, when others are tortured or oppressed, or treated as if they were less than who they are.”

Ubuntu Press will work in the spirit of Ubuntu seeking, supporting and sharing the stories and works of the collective community voice in an effort to build a greater human experience.

What We Need & What You Get

Resources to self- publish the first two complete manuscripts the Ubuntu Press forthcoming titles.

Forthcoming manuscripts from Ubuntu Press

Raising Kazembe: A Memoir This collection of journal letter written by an HIV positive father to his son. It chronicles the lesson of life and education, the mental and emotional health of a father who deals with isolation, stigma, mental health issues as well as how the traumas of his childhood plays out in his parenting and desire to heal.

Sistah’s Speak (voices of HIV positive women) is the working title for a collection of short fiction, poetry, creative nonfiction, personal narratives, critical essays and visual art from women living with HIV/AIDS. This project seeks to create a space for women to share their stories in their own voice sharing with an opens heart as a vehicle for chronicling your lives. The goal of this project is to empower, supports the soul and uplifts the spirit of women people living with HIV/AIDS.

He Ain’t Heavy (voices of HIV positive heterosexual men) is the working title for a collection short fiction, poetry, creative nonfiction, personal narratives, critical essays and visual art of heterosexual men living with HIV/AIDS. This project seeks to create a space for heterosexual men to share their stories in their own voice sharing with an opens heart as a vehicle for chronicling your lives. The goal of this project is to empower, supports the soul and uplifts the spirit of all men people living with HIV/AIDS.

It Is Our Turn to Speak (voices of youth ages 13-29), anthology is a collection of short fiction, poetry, creative nonfiction, personal narratives, critical essays and visual art that features the voices and stories by youth responding to HIV/AIDS and the world in which our youth have to navigate as well as how HIV/AIDS effects their communities and relationships youth live in.

A Pastor’s Prayer for People Living with HIV/AIDS a collection of intercessory morning and evening prayers, for the people living with HIV/AIDS. This project seeks inspirational prayers that opens the heart, supports the soul and uplifts the spirit of people living with HIV/AIDS.

TransVoice: Shout Out Loud a collection of short fiction, poetry, creative nonfiction, personal narratives, critical essays, visual art, and personal stories of from the voices of transgendered people sharing their struggle, triumphs and victories. The purpose of this collection of voices is to document for perpetuity the lives of transgender person’s uniqueness and conviction to push through societal ignorance, stigma, shame and most importantly to live and shout out loud.

FACE US: Not Our Status But Our Story This coffee table portrait book of the faces of HIV in the southern United States. Each face represents a story of love, healing, and survival `in the deep south where the rates of HIV continue to rise and The South has not faced the epidemic.

All-in Branding Package, Custom Logo Design Package, a color palette, typography palette, a Stationery Design Package, a Landing Page Design Package, Blog Design Package, and a Brand Moodboard.

Custom Logo Design Package

Ø  2 initial custom logo concepts to choose from and 2 rounds of revisions on your chosen concept

Ø  Final logo files for both web and print: Scaleable, vector files: You will receive an .ai (Adobe Illustrator) and .eps file for your finalized logo concept

Ø  Vector PDF file: excellent for printing; can be opened in Illustrator

Ø  One high resolution .JPG logo file with a white background. You will receive this file in CMYK (for printing purposes) and RGB (for internet use).

Ø  One high resolution .PNG logo file with no background.

Ø  Final logo files in three different versions: ◦Full-color logo (main version)

Ø  Grayscale logo

Ø  Logo to use with a color background

Ø  Small version of your logo to use as a favicon or icon

COLOR PALETTE

Ø  An 8-tone color palette that reflects your brand’s visual identity.

Ø  This palette includes three primary, three secondary and two tertiary colors.

 IMAGERY

Ø  5 High resolution stock photos/graphics to boost your brand communications

BRANDING GUIDE

Ø  A quick reference PDF Branding Guide that includes:

Ø  RGB brand colors

Ø  CMYK brand colors

Ø  Web Safe color hex codes (for web design)

Ø  Typeface names and usage instructions

STATIONERY

Ø  A double sided business card design for two (2) of your team members

Ø  Business stationery: custom letterhead and envelope design

Ø  Sticker: Design of a sticker which will include a variation of the logo

LANDING PAGE DESIGN

Ø  Custom one-page HTML5+CSS3 design installed on your domain

Ø  2 rounds of revisions

Ø  Basic Search Engine Optimization (SEO)

Ø  Link to social networking profiles and brand blog

Ø  Google Analytics integration

Ø  Mailchimp or other mailing list form integration for signups

Ø  Image slider

Ø  Responsive (optimized for mobile devices)

Ø  Contact form

Ø  Landing Page Instruction manual (includes training on how to make basic changes)

Ø  Two rounds of design revisions

Ø  Installation and setup

BRAND BLOG DESIGN

A custom Tumblr blog template with branded design elements

Custom Header with background image

Custom Sidebar Titles

Custom Navigation Bar

Complementary blogging planner (in PDF format)

BRAND MOODBOARD

Ø  A handy PDF Brand Moodboard which includes the following: color palette, logo design, images that represent the identity of the brand, strategic notes describing the concept, textures and other design elements that will guide your brand’s communications.

Software upgrade to Microsoft 10

HP Office Jet Pro 8630 printer

The Impact

I have asked myself this question. “How can I use my position, knowledge of publishing, writing, editing, and sharing stories to help create a literary world that is diverse, equitable, and doesn’t just represent the same segment of society it always has since its inception? What concrete actions can I take to make actual change and move beyond the tired conversation we’ve been having for decades about the lack of diversity in publishing?”

Creating a small business which is Ubuntu Press was the answer. Yours support will allow Ubuntu Press to seek the voices and stories of those under- represented in publishing. Together will be allow the stories and history of our collective community to be told.

The impact of Ubuntu Press will be creating and building community through publishing where, “A person is a person through other people' strikes an affirmation of one’s humanity through recognition of an ‘other’ in his or her uniqueness and difference. It is a demand for a creative inter-subjective formation in which the ‘other’ becomes a mirror (but only a mirror) for my subjectivity. This idealism suggests to us that humanity is not embedded in my person solely as an individual; my humanity is co-substantively bestowed upon the other and me. Humanity is a quality we owe to each other. We create each other and need to sustain this otherness creation. And if we belong to each other, we participate in our creations: we are because you are, and since you are, definitely I am. The ‘I am’ is not a rigid subject, but a dynamic self-constitution dependent on this otherness creation of relation and distance”.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share, share, share and get the word out there, the more you can get the word out there to everyone, the quicker we can meet our goal.  Tweet, Facebook, Email.
