Resources to self- publish the first two
complete manuscripts the Ubuntu Press forthcoming titles. 
Forthcoming
manuscripts from Ubuntu Press 
Raising Kazembe: A Memoir This collection of journal
letter written by an HIV positive father to his son. It chronicles the lesson
of life and education, the mental and emotional health of a father who deals
with isolation, stigma, mental health issues as well as how the traumas of his
childhood plays out in his parenting and desire to heal.
Sistah’s Speak (voices of HIV positive
women) is the working title for a collection of short fiction, poetry, creative
nonfiction, personal narratives, critical essays and visual art from women
living with HIV/AIDS. This project seeks to create a space for women to share
their stories in their own voice sharing with an opens heart as a vehicle for
chronicling your lives. The goal of this project is to empower, supports the
soul and uplifts the spirit of women people living with HIV/AIDS.
He Ain’t Heavy (voices of HIV positive
heterosexual men) is the working title for a collection short fiction, poetry,
creative nonfiction, personal narratives, critical essays and visual art of
heterosexual men living with HIV/AIDS. This project seeks to create a space for
heterosexual men to share their stories in their own voice sharing with an
opens heart as a vehicle for chronicling your lives. The goal of this project
is to empower, supports the soul and uplifts the spirit of all men people
living with HIV/AIDS.
It Is Our Turn to Speak (voices of youth ages
13-29), anthology is a collection of short fiction, poetry, creative
nonfiction, personal narratives, critical essays and visual art that features
the voices and stories by youth responding to HIV/AIDS and the world in which
our youth have to navigate as well as how HIV/AIDS effects their communities
and relationships youth live in. 
A Pastor’s Prayer for People
Living with HIV/AIDS a
collection of intercessory morning and evening prayers, for the people living
with HIV/AIDS. This project seeks inspirational prayers that opens the heart,
supports the soul and uplifts the spirit of people living with HIV/AIDS.
TransVoice: Shout Out Loud a collection of short
fiction, poetry, creative nonfiction, personal narratives, critical essays,
visual art, and personal stories of from the voices of transgendered people
sharing their struggle, triumphs and victories. The purpose of this collection
of voices is to document for perpetuity the lives of transgender person’s
uniqueness and conviction to push through societal ignorance, stigma, shame and
most importantly to live and shout out loud.
FACE US: Not Our Status But
Our Story This
coffee table portrait book of the faces of HIV in the southern United States.
Each face represents a story of love, healing, and survival `in the deep south
where the rates of HIV continue to rise and The South has not faced the
epidemic.
All-in Branding Package, Custom Logo Design
Package, a color palette, typography palette, a Stationery Design Package, a
Landing Page Design Package, Blog Design Package, and a Brand Moodboard. 
Custom Logo Design Package
Ø  2 initial
custom logo concepts to choose from and 2 rounds of revisions on your chosen
concept
Ø  Final logo
files for both web and print: Scaleable, vector files: You will receive an .ai
(Adobe Illustrator) and .eps file for your finalized logo concept
Ø  Vector PDF
file: excellent for printing; can be opened in Illustrator 
Ø  One high
resolution .JPG logo file with a white background. You will receive this file
in CMYK (for printing purposes) and RGB (for internet use).
Ø  One high
resolution .PNG logo file with no background.
Ø  Final logo
files in three different versions: ◦Full-color logo (main version)
Ø  Grayscale
logo
Ø  Logo to use
with a color background
Ø  Small
version of your logo to use as a favicon or icon
COLOR PALETTE
Ø  An 8-tone
color palette that reflects your brand’s visual identity. 
Ø  This palette
includes three primary, three secondary and two tertiary colors. 
 IMAGERY

Ø  5 High
resolution stock photos/graphics to boost your brand communications
BRANDING GUIDE 
Ø  A quick
reference PDF Branding Guide that includes: 
Ø  RGB brand
colors
Ø  CMYK brand
colors
Ø  Web Safe
color hex codes (for web design)
Ø  Typeface
names and usage instructions
STATIONERY 
Ø  A double
sided business card design for two (2) of your team members
Ø  Business
stationery: custom letterhead and envelope design
Ø  Sticker:
Design of a sticker which will include a variation of the logo 
LANDING PAGE DESIGN 
Ø  Custom
one-page HTML5+CSS3 design installed on your domain
Ø  2 rounds of
revisions
Ø  Basic Search
Engine Optimization (SEO) 
Ø  Link to
social networking profiles and brand blog
Ø  Google
Analytics integration
Ø  Mailchimp or
other mailing list form integration for signups
Ø  Image slider
Ø  Responsive
(optimized for mobile devices)
Ø  Contact form
Ø  Landing Page
Instruction manual (includes training on how to make basic changes)
Ø  Two rounds
of design revisions
Ø  Installation
and setup
BRAND BLOG DESIGN 
A
custom Tumblr blog template with branded design elements
Custom
Header with background image
Custom
Sidebar Titles
Custom
Navigation Bar
Complementary
blogging planner (in PDF format)
BRAND MOODBOARD
Ø  A handy PDF
Brand Moodboard which includes the following: color palette, logo design,
images that represent the identity of the brand, strategic notes describing the
concept, textures and other design elements that will guide your brand’s
communications. 
Software
upgrade
to Microsoft 10 
HP Office
Jet Pro 8630 printer
    The Impact 
I have asked myself this question. “How can I
use my position, knowledge of publishing, writing, editing, and sharing stories
to help create a literary world that is diverse, equitable, and doesn’t just
represent the same segment of society it always has since its inception? What
concrete actions can I take to make actual change and move beyond the tired
conversation we’ve been having for decades about the lack of diversity in
publishing?”
Creating a small business which is Ubuntu Press was the answer. Yours
support will allow Ubuntu Press to
seek the voices and stories of those under- represented in publishing. Together
will be allow the stories and history of our collective community to be told. 
The impact of Ubuntu Press will be creating and building community through
publishing where, “A person is a person through other people' strikes an
affirmation of one’s humanity through recognition of an ‘other’ in his or her
uniqueness and difference. It is a demand for a creative inter-subjective
formation in which the ‘other’ becomes a mirror (but only a mirror) for my
subjectivity. This idealism suggests to us that humanity is not embedded in my
person solely as an individual; my humanity is co-substantively bestowed upon
the other and me. Humanity is a quality we owe to each other. We create each
other and need to sustain this otherness creation. And if we belong to each
other, we participate in our creations: we are because you are, and since you
are, definitely I am. The ‘I am’ is not a rigid subject, but a dynamic
self-constitution dependent on this otherness creation of relation and
distance”.
Other Ways You Can Help
 
Share, share, share and get the word out there,
the more you can get the word out there to everyone, the quicker we can meet
our goal.  Tweet, Facebook, Email.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

My name is Nallie Brumskine Moore founder of Delivering Good Health Community Services International a practicing nurse whose personal experiences of struggle while growing up in the war-torn nation of Liberia was translated into a vision with passion to help improve the health care of people in desperate living conditions.

The humanitarian situation in Liberia is challenging and require urgent attention as women and children struggle to battle the huge desperation for better livelihood and recovery after the ebola out brake. From healthcare  problem to loss of livelihood or death of many family breadwinner children are left homeless and with a very dark future. Kids are place in orphanage that can not afford to meet their needs.

Our mission is to provide better health conditions, shelter, nutrition and education to enhance wellness and better life expectancy for the elderly, woman and children in Liberia west Africa. your donation will help us continue this effort and give hope to the hopeless. we also deliver medical suppilies, food, clothes, shoes and educational material to the orphanage homes. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $25,000 in 40 days that will go directly to the up keep of these children in seven (7) different orphanage homes in Liberia West Africa. Due to our outstanding Partnership with Georgetown university hospital in Washington DC, we get medical supplies donation that need to be shipped to west Africa to improved the health and well being of Elderly, women and children.

When you donate, your money goes directly to:

  • Shipment of medical supplies received from Medstar Georgetown university hospital.

  • purchased of relief materials such as (Food, Clothing, Educational materials and mattresses for the Orphanage homes in Liberia).

  • And to Invest in the future of children by getting them back in school.                                                                                                                                           With your donation the lives of these children in the orphanage home will be transformed. 

The Impact
Your contribution will transform the lives of Children by providing them with improved health care and Education. Providing them with the necessary educational materials such as (Books, School Bag, Shoes, Stationary, Notebooks).
Will create awareness for girls, education, better health care and hygiene kit for elderly women and men in west Africa(Liberia). Currently we are working with orphanage homes and a great improvement have been achieved. To have an overview of our achievements and projects please visit our site at www.dghcs.org
  Other Ways You Can Help
 You may be asking yourselves why I’m sharing this now or how you can be part of this project… in many ways:

- With your affection, which I will always be grateful for.

- By helping others learn about Delivering Good Health Community Services International and understand the particularities of this condition in order to give less fortunate people the hope of having a way out.

For any more information, questions or comments, please email us at nallie@dghcs.org

story:
Boy Meets Beer

An American, a Belgian, a 100-year old Croatian guy and a Bosnian lady are on a farm near Zagreb.  It's not a joke!!!!!

Tim Bourcier, founder of Fjaka Pivovara, moved to Split, Croatia, three years ago and opened To Je To Caffe Bar.  The first bar of its kind in Croatia, focusing on local products from small producers.  Back then, there was not much Croatian craft beer to choose from.  While the scene has grown, this wine country still lacks a little on the beer culture end.

Tim spent a year going to Zagreb making beer on a farm in a giant pot normally used for making preserves for the winter.  12 hour days outside in the snow or in blazing hot temperatures are not so bad when you are with good friends doing something you really enjoy.  

Tim drew from his beer drinking experience in the U.S. to put together some recipes very different from what others are producing in Croatia.  So far, we have a single-hopped Centennial India Pale Ale, a coffee stout and a seasonal pumpkin ale.  Our limited supplies were really enjoyed by our customers....now it's time to get these out to the public.  That's where we need your help!

No more playing it safe!  Fjaka is looking to do something different and put new beer flavors on people's palette.  

What We Need 

We are asking for $20,000 for this project.  This money plus some of our own will get us a brewing system that is ideal--not excessively large, but big enough so we will not waste money on upgrades too soon.
  • A 500-liter brewing pot;
  • Six fermenters;
  • A little help with rent money;
  • Bottles, caps, kegs and ingredients so we can get rolling.

We already met with a really great family-owned company in Slovenia who provided us the best estimate for the brewing equipment.  
Perks
Check out all of our perks in the video below:



Everything helps.  $2 is great.....if you are planning on coming to Croatia, check out our beer adventure and tour opportunities.

What if we don't make it?
Then we just start a little smaller.  We buy a couple less fermenters.  Maybe we only use bottles, or just kegs, but not both.  We will still buy the 500 liter brewing pot and we start a little slower then what we wanted.  But the show will go on!

Impact

Beer is fun. Ultimately, this project is about more than just beer. Split, Croatia has an unemployment rate over 11%.  This project is a job creator.  Fjaka will need employees.  As much as possible, we will also buy local products and put our money back into the community.  Although it is a small brewery, it will have an important impact on the community.

The Fjaka team has a history of working with local charities in Split to help out with Christmas food drives, art projects for kids at a local orphanage and our furry friends too.  The brewery will continue to work with local charities and community groups.

We also want to teach people how to make beer.  Knowledge is power!  Who knows what a young person can do with this new skill?!  Even if it's making beer for some friends or starting a business of his/her own brewery.  We want to pay it forward.

Risks & Challenges

A bunch of new beers have popped up all over this country.  A good sign that a brewery will be successful.  Tim has already opened and is running a successful caffe bar in Split.  Beer prototypes have been tested by beer geeks and regular ol' beer lovers.  They like it, they really like it!

There does not seem to be much in the way of getting this off the ground and running.  We just need some help from you.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute, we still love you.  Please share this with your friends.  If you follow us on all of our social media options that would be great too.

story:
UPDATE from 4:40 PM Israeli time

AARON HAS BEEN FOUND SAFE AND SOUND IN TEL AVIV!!!!!!
BARUCH HASHEM. THE FAMILY ASKS THAT YOU NOT BOMBARD THEM WITH PHONE CALLS AT THIS TIME. WE DON'T KNOW ANY DETAILS OF WHERE HE'S BEEN OR WHAT HAPPENED BUT THAT WILL BE A PRIVATE MATTER UNLESS THE FAMILY CHOSES TO SHARE. THANK YOU TO EVERYONE THAT BECAME SO INVESTED IN THE SEARCH. AM YISRAEL CHAI!

Background

אהרון בן 25 תושב רמת בית שמש, נראה לאחרונה ביום חמישי האחרון לקראת חצות, ברחוב נהר הירדן.

תיאורו: גובה 1.80, מבנה גוף מלא, שיער קצוץ, לבש מכנס כהה, חולצה קצרה (לא ידוע הצבע) וחבש כיפה לראשו.

כל מי שראה או שמע שיפנה במיידית למשטרה, המשפחה דואגת וכואבת כבר כמעט שבוע


Hebrew name for davening - Aaron Eliezer ben Chana Esther


  • Last Friday Sep 11th at around 12 pm Aaron accepted a ride form a friend of his at the trempiada outside Givat Shaul (in Jerusalem) on Kvish 1.
  • Aaron told his friend he wanted to get to TEL AVIV
  • The friend took him as far as RAMLE
  • This was the last place he was seen
According to his family, Aaron likes to occasionally go the beach, so its possible that is where he was headed. 
Aaron is an amazing, responsible young man who has never done anything like this before. Please lets do what we can to help locate him.

If you have any info, please  call the police directly  at 100 or 02-9902223.

We are in dire need of volunteers please contact us at our Facebook page (https://www.facebook.com/groups/Findaaronschnei...).

Funds required for:

100% of funds will go towards search efforts which at this stage need a serious ramp-up including:

  • printing and circulating flyers
  • hiring a professional PR agency to create public awareness and escalate pressure on authorities to put more resources on the case

Who we are:

A concerned group of neighbors and friends of the family. This is the one and only fund-raising campaign endorsed by the family.

Other relevant links:

http://bsn.co.il/%D7%A1%D7%91%D7%99%D7%91%D7%94/%D7%A0%D7%A2%D7%93%D7%A8-%D7%9E%D7%A8%D7%9E%D7%AA-%D7%91%D7%99%D7%AA-%D7%A9%D7%9E%D7%A9-%D7%90%D7%94%D7%A8%D7%95%D7%9F-%D7%A9%D7%A0%D7%99%D7%99%D7%93%D7%A8%D7%9E%D7%9F/6139

http://www.jpost.com/Israel-News/Family-of-missing-Israeli-American-man-ask-for-public-assistance-in-finding-their-son-416457

story:
I'm Alana Becker, a 22 year old lingerie designer & apprentice motor trimmer. My label is called Desvalido Australia, where I carefully hand make lingerie on Fridays & weekends, when my busy life permits! 

I've started this campaign to help turn my 10 hour days into 30 hour days. With 2 new high powered sewing machines, I hope to cut my processing times by 2/3 meaning things that used to take 1 hour to sew, now take 20 minutes. You can get a lot more done when you work efficiently! 

What I Need & What You Get

On my wish list are two sewing machines:
Juki MO-6704
A rolled hemmer, which I use to finish off all my French knickers. 7,000 stitches per minute, compared to what I use now which is 1,500 stitches per minute. A high quality industrial machine like this would give a perfect finish every time, meaning my work stays looking professional & impressive. The quote I got for this machine was $2475 AUD
Juki LZ-2290A-SS-7 
A computerised zigzag machine used to sew elastic on lingerie. It has an automatic thread trimmer & reinforces seams automatically, leaving the finished product stronger & longer lasting. It sews 5,000 stitches per minute, what I'm using at the moment is more along the lines of 1,000 stitches per minute. The quote I got for this machine was $11,550 AUD 
Total: $14,025 AUD
How can you help? Buy a pair of French knickers!
My brand makes some of the best French knickers in the country. They flatter your butt like nothing you've ever worn before, & the 100% silk French knickers are so naturally lightweight that they feel like you're wearing nothing at all. They're the perfect hot Aussie summer christmas present to yourself, your lover, your mum, whoever, the recipients are endless! Everyone looks good in them & they currently go up to a size 22 (custom sizes available just send me an email!). They're a lovely, personal gift that doesn't have to be suggestive. These will be sent out early December to arrive by Christmas if you're in Australia.
Even though the goal is $14,000, every item a customer buys helps to grow my label bigger than it was before. Every sale makes a difference when you're hand made. If we don't reach $14,000, the money funded will be used as a deposit on one or both machines.

The plan is to make as many pairs of French knickers as possible, to bring joy to the world & sewing machines to the Desvalido studio! Support your hand makers, after all, are there any other CEOs who personally thank you after they handwrite your address & hand wrap a package filled with their hopes & creative dreams? We do this for you as well as ourselves! We create jobs for ourselves in an economy that doesn't know which way is up. We try our hardest & sometimes we simply can't do things alone.

If you'd like to support this campaign but can't contribute directly, feel free to put some Desvalido French knickers on your wish list these holidays & send this link to Santa (or your significant other, same thing right?)
Thank you! XO Alana, Desvalido Australia

It sews 5,000 stitches per minute, what I'm using at the moment is more along the lines of 1,000 stitches per minute. The quote I got for this machine was $11,550 AUD 
Total: $14,025 AUD
How can you help? Buy a pair of French knickers!My brand makes some of the best French knickers in the country. They flatter your butt like nothing you've ever worn before, & the 100% silk French knickers are so naturally lightweight that they feel like you're wearing nothing at all. They're the perfect hot Aussie summer christmas present to yourself, your lover, your mum, whoever, the recipients are endless! Everyone looks good in them & they currently go up to a size 22 (custom sizes available just send me an email!). They're a lovely, personal gift that doesn't have to be suggestive. These will be sent out early December to arrive by Christmas if you're in Australia.
Even though the goal is $14,000, every item a customer buys helps to grow my label bigger than it was before. Every sale makes a difference when you're hand made. If we don't reach $14,000, the money funded will be used as a deposit on one or both machines.
 The plan is to make as many pairs of French knickers as possible, to bring joy to the world & sewing machines to the Desvalido studio! Support your hand makers, after all, are there any other CEOs who personally thank you after they handwrite your address & hand wrap a package filled with their hopes & creative dreams? We do this for you as well as ourselves! We create jobs for ourselves in an economy that doesn't know which way is up. We try our hardest & sometimes we simply can't do things alone.  If you'd like to support this campaign but can't contribute directly, feel free to put some Desvalido French knickers on your wish list these holidays & send this link to Santa (or your significant other, same thing right?)Thank you! XO Alana, Desvalido Australia

story:
Versión en español 
Versió en català 

ENGLISH


Help us make a difference to the way kids engage with current affairs. Through special news reports incorporating Augmented Reality we can make the news engaging and meaningful to children.


NEWSKID is a transmedia project that wants to engage children in current affairs using Augmented Reality over three fun interactive platforms: a website, a prop and a newspaper. These are combined to create a very immersive story world that makes the news accessible for children. Right now we have the prototype almost ready and we want you to be the first one to try it. If you get any of the perks you will be helping us to keep going.

We have created a character from another planet, Nushu, whose mission is to report back to its people about what is happening on Earth. It enlists the help of young readers to help it create its reports, prompting children to learn about international current affairs in a fun way and to participate in news reporting.


When using our Android app, Nushu appears in 3D on top of the front page.

The print cube becomes an interactive prop with Augmented Reality. 

In the interactive website children play the role of Nushu exploring the news.

WHAT ARE THE BENEFITS?

  • It stimulates an interest in current affairs -  Kids are easily motivated to understanding what’s going on in the world thanks to our engaging storytelling.

  • It encourages critical thinking - NEWSKID aims to stimulate children’s minds in order to train them to be free thinkers now and in their future.

  • Children become active participants in the news coverage  - We want children to be an active part of NEWSKID and bring them on board of the writing and producing of news broadcasts in a playful way.

  • It uses the latest technologies  - NEWSKID is one of the first companies to bring Augmented Reality to the areas of news and education taking them to the next level.

  • Children have fun with it!  - And that’s crucial for us. We believe that fun is the path to a happier and and aware future citizen.


WHAT ARE THE PERKS?

Help us by choosing one of our perks (they use an Android app).

  • In the postcard, Nushu makes a short introduction about himself through Augmented Reality (1 AR interaction).

  • With the print issue (an A4 newspaper frontpage) you’ll explore Nushu’s findings on its first mission: understanding what ebola is about (3 AR interactions).

  • With the interactive cube, children can play with Nushu (6 AR interactions).

  • You may also shape how NEWSKID will develop in the future by making suggestions to the NEWSKID team.

  • We’ll be also excited to have a videocall to talk about NEWSKID and how can we engage children in current affairs.

MORE ADVANTAGES FOR YOU

Moreover, if NEWSKID keeps going with your help and we can offer service to individuals at any moment next year, you will receive special treatment. We will give you free access to content. We can’t be more precise because the future is uncertain and there are things we don’t know yet. We will keep working every day to make NEWSKID a long lasting project. We will keep you informed. We want you to be part of it.


WHAT WE COULD ACHIEVE WITH YOUR HELP

The prototype is successful amongst children. Right now we need to adjust technology, improve user experience, make new reports and let people know about NEWSKID. We also want to incorporate new platforms, such as Virtual Reality, and produce an audiovisual for television.

Even though we have worked a lot, we have to keep walking. Our goal is to make NEWSKID become an international source for kids to know what happens in the world in a fun way.

We need your help in order to:

  • Upgrade our 3D character, Nushu - We are making it more fun, more dynamic, with more movements.

  • Improve the technology -  We are making Nushu more realistic, improving the app and creating an iphone version of our prototype.

  • Creating first short Nushu’ stories so everybody knows about it  - We will increase Nushu’s profile through a Youtube channel with short videos.

  • Creating a public website about Nushu so that family, schools and media interested can reach us.

  • Partner with media organisations - We intend to distribute NEWSKID as a print supplement to newspapers and as a TV show for broadcasters.

  • Spread the word - Tell anyone that you think could be interested in Nushu. Share this campaign on social networks. Tell schools and media you know about to contact us!

This is how we are distributing the resources of the campaign:

OUR STORY

The project is the brainchild of Eva Domínguez, a multimedia journalist with 25 years’ experience of making the news more engaging through the use of strong storytelling techniques combined with emerging technologies.  

“We use different platforms. Each of them has a role in the storytelling. We combine also physical objects with digital screens. Augmented Reality is incorporated into the physical prop and newspaper giving news coverage an almost game-like feel motivating children to do their own research and report back on the important issues of the day in order to help Nushu complete its mission.”

NEWSKID has been showcased at different global events this past summer with great impact. Now we are facing the challenge of launching the service.

This was achieved through personal investment from founder Eva Domínguez and an European grant (under the CreatiFi program) of 50,000€.

CHILDREN LOVE IT!


“The game on the cube was really cool!” - Anna
“Having a small alien explain the news through games, exercises and by asking questions is so much more convenient and fun than just watching someone on television speaking into a microphone” - Cristina 
“I like NEWSKID because it has pictures and vocabulary that I can understand” - Alexandra

THE TEAM

From left to right: Nushu, Eva Domínguez, Océane Apffel, Laia Ros and Maria Villuendas. Visit our profiles to know more about us. 


TOGETHER WE CAN MAKE IT!

However we look at it, to invest in children’s education is to invest in our common future: The world of tomorrow will inherit the children of today. Whether nations grow and prosper will depend heavily on the education of their citizens.

Help us reach our goal and help engage the next generation of global citizens.

--------------------------

ESPAÑOL


Ayúdanos a cambiar cómo los niños se relacionan con las noticias. A través de unos reportajes con realidad aumentada podemos hacer que encuentren el sentido de la actualidad informativa y se diviertan.


NEWSKID es un proyecto transmedia que quiere acercar la actualidad informativa a los niños de forma entretenida e innovadora. Se desarrolla en tres plataformas: un diario, un objeto físico y una web. Las tres plataformas se combinan para explicar los temas internacionales con realidad aumentada. Ahora tenemos el prototipo casi acabado y queremos que seas el primero en probarlo. Si adquieres alguna de las recompensas nos ayudarás a seguir adelante con este proyecto.

Hemos creado Nushu, un extraterrestre cuya misión es explicar a su especie lo que pasa en la Tierra. Para ello, pide la ayuda a los niños, que  aprenden sobre asuntos internacionales de forma divertida a la vez que descubren el proceso de elaboración de las noticias.

Al utilizar la aplicación de Android, Nushu aparece en 3D sobre la portada. 

El cubo se convierte en un objeto interactivo con realidad aumentada. 

En la web interactiva, los niños asumen el rol de Nushu en su misión. 


¿CUÁLES SON SUS VENTAJAS? 

  • Estimula el interés por las noticias  -  Los niños se sienten motivados para entender lo que pasa en el mundo gracias al relato de aventuras. 

  • Promueve el pensamiento crítico  - NEWSKID pretende incentivar a los niños para que puedan desarrollar un criterio propio ahora y en el futuro. 

  • Los niños participan en la cobertura informativa - Queremos que sean parte activa de NEWSKID invitándoles a crear sus propias piezas informativas. 

  • Utiliza las últimas tecnologías  - NEWSKID es una de las primeras empresas en aplicar la realidad aumentada en el sector de las noticias y la educación.

  • Los niños se divierten - Esto es sumamente importante, porque un niño que se divierte será un niño feliz y un ciudadano más responsable. 


¿CUÁLES SON LAS RECOMPENSAS?

Ayúdanos eligiendo una de estas recompensas (la app funciona para Android): 

  • En la postal, Nushu se presenta a través de la realidad aumentada  (una interacción con RA).

  • En el papel (una portada en tamaño A4) podrás conocer los descubrimientos de Nushu en su primera misión: entender qué es el ébola (3 interacciones con RA).

  • Con el cubo interactivo, los niños pueden jugar con Nushu (6 interacciones con RA).

  • También puedes ser parte del desarrollo futuro de NEWSKID con tus sugerencias.

  • Estaremos encantadas de realizar una videoconferencia para hablar de cómo NEWSKID puede involucrar a los niños en las noticias. 


MÁS VENTAJAS PARA TI

Además, si NEWSKID sigue adelante con tu ayuda y podemos ofrecer un servicio a particulares en algún momento del año que viene, tendrás un trato especial por habernos apoyado. Te daremos acceso gratis a contenidos. No podemos ser mucho más precisos porque el futuro es incierto y hay aspectos que aún no sabemos. Seguimos trabajando día a día para que NEWSKID tenga un largo recorrido. Te iremos informando de todo lo que hagamos. Queremos que tú formes parte de él.  


QUÉ PODRÍAMOS HACER CON VUESTRA AYUDA 

El prototipo tiene éxito entre los niños. Ahora necesitamos ajustar la tecnología, mejorar la experiencia de usuario, elaborar nuevos reportajes y dar a conocer NEWSKID. También queremos incorporar nuevas plataformas, como la realidad virtual y un audiovisual para televisión.

Aunque hemos hecho un largo camino, todavía nos queda mucho por recorrer. Nuestro objetivo es hacer de NEWSKID un recurso internacional para que los niños puedan acceder fácilmente y de forma entretenida a las noticias.

Con los beneficios de la venta del prototipo a través de esta campaña de micromecenazgo podremos:

  • Crear los primeros vídeos de Nushu para que todo el mundo lo conozca: Crearemos un canal de Youtube que periódicamente se actualizará con pequeñas aventuras del extraterrestre.

  • Crear una web pública: De este modo, los niños, familias, y escuelas interesados podrán encontrarnos.

  • Mejorar a Nushu: Lo queremos hacer más divertido y más dinámico.

  • Afinar la tecnología: Necesitamos pulir la aplicación para Android y crear una para móviles y tabletas de Apple.

  • Llegar a acuerdos con medios de comunicación: Queremos distribuir NEWSKID como un suplemento de papel para diarios y como un programa para cadenas de televisión.

  • Difundir el proyecto: Da a conocer NEWSKID a quien creas que le puede interesar. Comparte la campaña en las redes sociales. Enseña el producto a escuelas y medios de comunicación que conozcas para que se pongan en contacto con nosotros.


Así distribuiremos los ingresos de la campaña:

NUESTRA HISTORIA

El proyecto es una idea de Eva Domínguez, una periodista multimedia con 25 años de experiencia, especializada en narrativas emergentes y en nuevas tecnologías aplicadas al periodismo.

“Utilizamos varias plataformas, y cada una tiene su función en la narrativa. Combinamos objetos físicos con pantallas digitales. La realidad aumentada convierte las noticias en una experiencia lúdica y motiva a los niños a investigar por su cuenta sobre los temas de actualidad. También fomenta su papel activo, ya que pueden explicar a Nushu lo que han descubierto, ayudándole a completar su misión".

NEWSKID participó con éxito en varios encuentros internacionales el verano pasado. Ahora estamos ante el reto de lanzar el servicio comercialmente.

Hemos trabajado en NEWSKID durante un año. Este prototipo se ha conseguido gracias a la inversión personal de la fundadora, Eva Domínguez, y a una ayuda europea (dentro del programa CreatiFi) de 50.000€.


¡A LOS NIÑOS LES ENCANTA!


“El juego que aparece en el cubo mola” - Anna

“Que un extraterrestre explique las noticias a través de juegos, ejercicios y preguntando cosas es mejor que ver a alguien de la tele hablando con un micro”- Cristina

“Me gusta NEWSKID porque tiene imágenes y vocabulario que puedo entender” - Alexandra


EL EQUIPO

De izquierda a derecha: Nushu, Eva Domínguez, Océane Apffel, Laia Ros y Maria Villuendas. Visita nuestros perfiles para conocernos. 


¡JUNTOS PODEMOS HACERLO!

Invertir en la educación de los niños es invertir en nuestro futuro en común: el mundo de mañana pertenece a los niños de hoy. El desarrollo de un país depende en gran medida de la educación de sus habitantes.


-------------------

CATALÀ


Ajuda'ns a canviar la relació que tenen els nens amb les notícies. A través d'uns reportatges amb realitat augmentada podem fer que trobin sentit en l'actualitat informativa i es diverteixin.


NEWSKID és un projecte transmèdia que vol acostar l'actualitat informativa als nens de forma entretinguda i innovadora. Hi ha tres plataformes: un diari, un objecte físic i una web. Les tres plataformes es combinen per explicar els temes internacionals amb realitat augmentada. Tenim el prototip gairebé llest i volem que siguis el primer a provar-lo. Si compres alguna de les recompenses ens ajudaràs a seguir endavant amb el projecte.


Hem creat al Nushu, un extraterrestre la missió del qual és explicar a la seva espècie què passa a la Terra. Per fer-ho, demana ajuda als nens, que aprenen sobre assumptes internacionals de forma divertida, a la vegada que descobreixen el procés de creació de les notícies.


En utilitzar l'aplicació d'Android, en Nushu apareix en 3D a sobre de la portada.

El cub es converteix en un objecte interactiu amb realitat augmentada. 

A la web interactiva, els nens agafen el rol d'en Nushu per portar a terme la seva missió.


QUINS SÓN ELS SEUS AVANTATGES?

  • Estimula l'interès per les notícies - Els nens se senten motivats per entendre allò que passa al món gràcies a les aventures d'en Nushu.

  • Promou el pensament crític - NEWSKID pretén incentivar als nens per tal que puguin desenvolupar un criteri propi ara i en el futur.

  • Els nens participen en la cobertura informativa - Volem que siguin part activa de NEWSKID, ja que els convidem a crear les seves pròpies peces informatives.
  • Utilitza les tecnologies més avançades - NEWSKID és una de les primeres empreses que apliquen la realitat augmentada dintre dels sectors de la informació i de l'educació.

  • Els nens es diverteixen - Això és importantíssim, ja que un nen que es diverteixi serà una persona més feliç i un ciutadà més responsable.



QUINES SÓN LES RECOMPENSES?

Ajuda'ns i tria una d'aquestes recompenses (l’app funciona per Android):

  • A la postal, en Nushu es presenta a través de la realitat augmentada (una interacció amb RA).

  • Al paper (una portada a mida A4), podràs conèixer els descobriments que ha fet en Nushu durant la seva primera missió: entendre què és l'Ebola (3 interaccions amb RA)

  • Amb el cub interactiu, els nens poden jugar amb en Nushu (6 interaccions amb RA).
  • També podràs ajudar a dissenyar el futur desenvolupament de NEWSKID amb els teus suggeriments.
  • Estarem encantades de realitzar una videoconferència per parlar de com NEWSKID pot involucrar els nens amb les notícies.


MÉS AVANTATGES PER A TU

A més a més, si NEWSKID va endavant gràcies a la teva ajuda i podem oferir un servei a particulars a partir de l'any que ve, rebràs un tracte especial per haver-nos donat suport. Et donarem accés gratis a continguts. Ara mateix no podem ser més precises perquè el futur és incert i hi ha aspectes que encara no sabem. Continuem treballant dia a dia per tal que NEWSKID tingui un llarg recorregut, i t'anirem informant de tot allò que fem. Volem que en formis part.


QUÈ PODREM FER AMB LA VOSTRA AJUDA

Als nens els hi encanta el prototip, però encara necessitem ajustar la tecnologia, millorar l'experiència d'usuari, elaborar nous reportatges i donar a conèixer NEWSKID. També volem incorporar noves plataformes, com la realitat virtual i un audiovisual per a la televisió.


Encara que hem fet un camí molt llarg, encara ens queda molt per fer. El nostre objectiu és que NEWSKID es converteixi en un recurs internacional per tal que els nens i nenes de tot el món puguin accedir a les notícies de forma fàcil i entretinguda.


Amb els beneficis obtinguts per la venta del prototip a través d'aquesta campanya, podrem:

  • Crear els primers vídeos d'en Nushu per tal que tothom el conegui: Farem un canal de Youtube que s'actualitzarà periòdicament amb petites aventures de l'extraterrestre.

  • Crear una web pública: D'aquesta manera, els nens, les famílies i les escoles interessades ens podran trobar més fàcilment.
     
  • Millorar a en Nushu: Volem fer-lo més divertit i més dinàmic.
  • Afinar la tecnologia: Necessitem polir l'aplicació per a Android i crear-ne una per a mòbils i tabletes de Apple.

  • Arribar a acords amb mitjans de comunicació: Volem distribuir NEWSKID com un suplement per a diaris i com a programa per a cadenes de televisió.

  • Difondre el projecte: Dóna a conèixer NEWSKID a qui et sembli que li pugui interessar. Comparteix la campanya a les xarxes socials. Ensenya el producte a escoles i a mitjans de comunicació que coneguis per tal que es posin en contacte amb nosaltres.


Així distribuirem els ingressos de la campanya:


LA NOSTRA HISTÒRIA

El projecte és una idea de l'Eva Domínguez, una periodista multimèdia amb 25 anys d'experiència, especialitzada en narratives emergents i en noves tecnologies aplicades al periodisme.


"Utilitzem diferents plataformes, i cada una té la seva funció dintre de la narrativa. Combinem objectes físics amb pantalles digitals. La realitat augmentada converteix les notícies en una experiència lúdica i motiva als nens a investigar pel seu compte sobre els temes d'actualitat. També fomenta el seu paper actiu, ja que poden explicar a en Nushu allò que han descobert, de manera que puguin ajudar-lo a completar la seva missió".

NEWSKID va participar amb èxit en algunes trobades internacionals durant l'estiu passat. Ara ens enfrontem al repte de llançar-lo comercialment.


Hem treballat en el prototip durant un any, i s'ha aconseguit gràcies a la inversió personal de la fundadora, Eva Domínguez, i a una ajuda europea (dins del programa CreatiFi) de 50.000€.


ALS NENS ELS HI ENCANTA!


"El joc que apareix al cub mola" - Anna

"Que un extraterrestre expliqui les notícies a través de jocs, exercicis i preguntant coses és millor que veure a algú de la tele parlant per un micro" - Cristina

"M'agrada NEWSKID perquè té imatges i vocabulari que puc entendre" - Alexandra

L'EQUIP


D'esquerra a dreta: Nushu, Eva Domínguez, Océane Apffel, Laia Ros i Maria Villuendas. Visita els nostres perfils per saber més sobre nosaltres.


JUNTS PODEM FER-HO!

Invertir en l'educació dels nens és invertir en el nostre futur en comú: el món del demà pertany als nens d'avui. El desenvolupament d'un país depèn en gran mesura de l'educació dels seus habitants.

Si adquieres alguna de las recompensas nos ayudarás a seguir adelante con este proyecto.
Hemos creado Nushu, un extraterrestre cuya misión es explicar a su especie lo que pasa en la Tierra. Para ello, pide la ayuda a los niños, que  aprenden sobre asuntos internacionales de forma divertida a la vez que descubren el proceso de elaboración de las noticias. 

Al utilizar la aplicación de Android, Nushu aparece en 3D sobre la portada. El cubo se convierte en un objeto interactivo con realidad aumentada. 

En la web interactiva, los niños asumen el rol de Nushu en su misión. 

¿CUÁLES SON SUS VENTAJAS? 
Estimula el interés por las noticias  -  Los niños se sienten motivados para entender lo que pasa en el mundo gracias al relato de aventuras. 
Promueve el pensamiento crítico  - NEWSKID pretende incentivar a los niños para que puedan desarrollar un criterio propio ahora y en el futuro. 
Los niños participan en la cobertura informativa - Queremos que sean parte activa de NEWSKID invitándoles a crear sus propias piezas informativas. 
Utiliza las últimas tecnologías  - NEWSKID es una de las primeras empresas en aplicar la realidad aumentada en el sector de las noticias y la educación.
Los niños se divierten - Esto es sumamente importante, porque un niño que se divierte será un niño feliz y un ciudadano más responsable. 




¿CUÁLES SON LAS RECOMPENSAS?
Ayúdanos eligiendo una de estas recompensas (la app funciona para Android): 

En la postal, Nushu se presenta a través de la realidad aumentada  (una interacción con RA).
En el papel (una portada en tamaño A4) podrás conocer los descubrimientos de Nushu en su primera misión: entender qué es el ébola (3 interacciones con RA).
Con el cubo interactivo, los niños pueden jugar con Nushu (6 interacciones con RA).
También puedes ser parte del desarrollo futuro de NEWSKID con tus sugerencias.
Estaremos encantadas de realizar una videoconferencia para hablar de cómo NEWSKID puede involucrar a los niños en las noticias. 






MÁS VENTAJAS PARA TI
Además, si NEWSKID sigue adelante con tu ayuda y podemos ofrecer un servicio a particulares en algún momento del año que viene, tendrás un trato especial por habernos apoyado. Te daremos acceso gratis a contenidos. No podemos ser mucho más precisos porque el futuro es incierto y hay aspectos que aún no sabemos. Seguimos trabajando día a día para que NEWSKID tenga un largo recorrido. Te iremos informando de todo lo que hagamos. Queremos que tú formes parte de él.  


QUÉ PODRÍAMOS HACER CON VUESTRA AYUDA 
El prototipo tiene éxito entre los niños. Ahora necesitamos ajustar la tecnología, mejorar la experiencia de usuario, elaborar nuevos reportajes y dar a conocer NEWSKID. También queremos incorporar nuevas plataformas, como la realidad virtual y un audiovisual para televisión.
Aunque hemos hecho un largo camino, todavía nos queda mucho por recorrer. Nuestro objetivo es hacer de NEWSKID un recurso internacional para que los niños puedan acceder fácilmente y de forma entretenida a las noticias.
Con los beneficios de la venta del prototipo a través de esta campaña de micromecenazgo podremos:

Crear los primeros vídeos de Nushu para que todo el mundo lo conozca: Crearemos un canal de Youtube que periódicamente se actualizará con pequeñas aventuras del extraterrestre.
Crear una web pública: De este modo, los niños, familias, y escuelas interesados podrán encontrarnos.
Mejorar a Nushu: Lo queremos hacer más divertido y más dinámico.
Afinar la tecnología: Necesitamos pulir la aplicación para Android y crear una para móviles y tabletas de Apple.
Llegar a acuerdos con medios de comunicación: Queremos distribuir NEWSKID como un suplemento de papel para diarios y como un programa para cadenas de televisión.
Difundir el proyecto: Da a conocer NEWSKID a quien creas que le puede interesar. Comparte la campaña en las redes sociales. Enseña el producto a escuelas y medios de comunicación que conozcas para que se pongan en contacto con nosotros.

Así distribuiremos los ingresos de la campaña:


NUESTRA HISTORIA
El proyecto es una idea de Eva Domínguez, una periodista multimedia con 25 años de experiencia, especializada en narrativas emergentes y en nuevas tecnologías aplicadas al periodismo.
“Utilizamos varias plataformas, y cada una tiene su función en la narrativa. Combinamos objetos físicos con pantallas digitales. La realidad aumentada convierte las noticias en una experiencia lúdica y motiva a los niños a investigar por su cuenta sobre los temas de actualidad. También fomenta su papel activo, ya que pueden explicar a Nushu lo que han descubierto, ayudándole a completar su misión".
NEWSKID participó con éxito en varios encuentros internacionales el verano pasado. Ahora estamos ante el reto de lanzar el servicio comercialmente.
Hemos trabajado en NEWSKID durante un año. Este prototipo se ha conseguido gracias a la inversión personal de la fundadora, Eva Domínguez, y a una ayuda europea (dentro del programa CreatiFi) de 50.000€.

¡A LOS NIÑOS LES ENCANTA!

“El juego que aparece en el cubo mola” - Anna


“Que un extraterrestre explique las noticias a través de juegos, ejercicios y preguntando cosas es mejor que ver a alguien de la tele hablando con un micro”- Cristina


“Me gusta NEWSKID porque tiene imágenes y vocabulario que puedo entender” - Alexandra


EL EQUIPO
De izquierda a derecha: Nushu, Eva Domínguez, Océane Apffel, Laia Ros y Maria Villuendas. Visita nuestros perfiles para conocernos. 

¡JUNTOS PODEMOS HACERLO!Invertir en la educación de los niños es invertir en nuestro futuro en común: el mundo de mañana pertenece a los niños de hoy. El desarrollo de un país depende en gran medida de la educación de sus habitantes.


-------------------

CATALÀ
Ajuda'ns a canviar la relació que tenen els nens amb les notícies. A través d'uns reportatges amb realitat augmentada podem fer que trobin sentit en l'actualitat informativa i es diverteixin.
NEWSKID és un projecte transmèdia que vol acostar l'actualitat informativa als nens de forma entretinguda i innovadora. Hi ha tres plataformes: un diari, un objecte físic i una web. Les tres plataformes es combinen per explicar els temes internacionals amb realitat augmentada. Tenim el prototip gairebé llest i volem que siguis el primer a provar-lo. Si compres alguna de les recompenses ens ajudaràs a seguir endavant amb el projecte.
Hem creat al Nushu, un extraterrestre la missió del qual és explicar a la seva espècie què passa a la Terra. Per fer-ho, demana ajuda als nens, que aprenen sobre assumptes internacionals de forma divertida, a la vegada que descobreixen el procés de creació de les notícies.


En utilitzar l'aplicació d'Android, en Nushu apareix en 3D a sobre de la portada.
El cub es converteix en un objecte interactiu amb realitat augmentada. 
A la web interactiva, els nens agafen el rol d'en Nushu per portar a terme la seva missió.


QUINS SÓN ELS SEUS AVANTATGES?


Estimula l'interès per les notícies - Els nens se senten motivats per entendre allò que passa al món gràcies a les aventures d'en Nushu.

Promou el pensament crític - NEWSKID pretén incentivar als nens per tal que puguin desenvolupar un criteri propi ara i en el futur.

Els nens participen en la cobertura informativa - Volem que siguin part activa de NEWSKID, ja que els convidem a crear les seves pròpies peces informatives.


Utilitza les tecnologies més avançades - NEWSKID és una de les primeres empreses que apliquen la realitat augmentada dintre dels sectors de la informació i de l'educació.
Els nens es diverteixen - Això és importantíssim, ja que un nen que es diverteixi serà una persona més feliç i un ciutadà més responsable.




QUINES SÓN LES RECOMPENSES?
Ajuda'ns i tria una d'aquestes recompenses (l’app funciona per Android):


A la postal, en Nushu es presenta a través de la realitat augmentada (una interacció amb RA).
Al paper (una portada a mida A4), podràs conèixer els descobriments que ha fet en Nushu durant la seva primera missió: entendre què és l'Ebola (3 interaccions amb RA)

Amb el cub interactiu, els nens poden jugar amb en Nushu (6 interaccions amb RA).


També podràs ajudar a dissenyar el futur desenvolupament de NEWSKID amb els teus suggeriments.

Estarem encantades de realitzar una videoconferència per parlar de com NEWSKID pot involucrar els nens amb les notícies.





MÉS AVANTATGES PER A TU
A més a més, si NEWSKID va endavant gràcies a la teva ajuda i podem oferir un servei a particulars a partir de l'any que ve, rebràs un tracte especial per haver-nos donat suport. Et donarem accés gratis a continguts. Ara mateix no podem ser més precises perquè el futur és incert i hi ha aspectes que encara no sabem. Continuem treballant dia a dia per tal que NEWSKID tingui un llarg recorregut, i t'anirem informant de tot allò que fem. Volem que en formis part.
QUÈ PODREM FER AMB LA VOSTRA AJUDA
Als nens els hi encanta el prototip, però encara necessitem ajustar la tecnologia, millorar l'experiència d'usuari, elaborar nous reportatges i donar a conèixer NEWSKID. També volem incorporar noves plataformes, com la realitat virtual i un audiovisual per a la televisió.
Encara que hem fet un camí molt llarg, encara ens queda molt per fer. El nostre objectiu és que NEWSKID es converteixi en un recurs internacional per tal que els nens i nenes de tot el món puguin accedir a les notícies de forma fàcil i entretinguda.
Amb els beneficis obtinguts per la venta del prototip a través d'aquesta campanya, podrem:


Crear els primers vídeos d'en Nushu per tal que tothom el conegui: Farem un canal de Youtube que s'actualitzarà periòdicament amb petites aventures de l'extraterrestre.

Crear una web pública: D'aquesta manera, els nens, les famílies i les escoles interessades ens podran trobar més fàcilment. 


Millorar a en Nushu: Volem fer-lo més divertit i més dinàmic.

Afinar la tecnologia: Necessitem polir l'aplicació per a Android i crear-ne una per a mòbils i tabletes de Apple.
Arribar a acords amb mitjans de comunicació: Volem distribuir NEWSKID com un suplement per a diaris i com a programa per a cadenes de televisió.
Difondre el projecte: Dóna a conèixer NEWSKID a qui et sembli que li pugui interessar. Comparteix la campanya a les xarxes socials. Ensenya el producte a escoles i a mitjans de comunicació que coneguis per tal que es posin en contacte amb nosaltres.


Així distribuirem els ingressos de la campanya:




LA NOSTRA HISTÒRIA
El projecte és una idea de l'Eva Domínguez, una periodista multimèdia amb 25 anys d'experiència, especialitzada en narratives emergents i en noves tecnologies aplicades al periodisme.
"Utilitzem diferents plataformes, i cada una té la seva funció dintre de la narrativa. Combinem objectes físics amb pantalles digitals. La realitat augmentada converteix les notícies en una experiència lúdica i motiva als nens a investigar pel seu compte sobre els temes d'actualitat. També fomenta el seu paper actiu, ja que poden explicar a en Nushu allò que han descobert, de manera que puguin ajudar-lo a completar la seva missió".
NEWSKID va participar amb èxit en algunes trobades internacionals durant l'estiu passat. Ara ens enfrontem al repte de llançar-lo comercialment.
Hem treballat en el prototip durant un any, i s'ha aconseguit gràcies a la inversió personal de la fundadora, Eva Domínguez, i a una ajuda europea (dins del programa CreatiFi) de 50.000€.
ALS NENS ELS HI ENCANTA!



"El joc que apareix al cub mola" - Anna


"Que un extraterrestre expliqui les notícies a través de jocs, exercicis i preguntant coses és millor que veure a algú de la tele parlant per un micro" - Cristina


"M'agrada NEWSKID perquè té imatges i vocabulari que puc entendre" - Alexandra

L'EQUIP
D'esquerra a dreta: Nushu, Eva Domínguez, Océane Apffel, Laia Ros i Maria Villuendas. Visita els nostres perfils per saber més sobre nosaltres.
JUNTS PODEM FER-HO!Invertir en l'educació dels nens és invertir en el nostre futur en comú: el món del demà pertany als nens d'avui. El desenvolupament d'un país depèn en gran mesura de l'educació dels seus habitants.

story:
In life only two things matter: Love and Food.

Two years ago we began to experiment with the wildest recipes, tasted the worst and the best outcomes, drank too much wine, danced around the kitchen, learned how to cook Ketchup. We invited friends and family to blind tastings with an overwhelmingly positive feedback that encouraged us to continue on our quest to create a ketchup. We don't want our ketchup to end up on some dull Big Mac but on a freshly prepared burger or a great steak; our ketchup comes with food that you eat for fun, not on the run.

We are hedonists. We acknowledge and appreciate good food. We love to cook and we know that the right combination of patience, passion and good ingredients are necessary to create a great meal, a delicious condiment, a real ketchup. We cook our ketchup for people who recognise the contradiction between high quality and low price, people who buy their vegetables from the farmer, not the discounter, people who don’t follow trends but create them.

Curtice Brothers - Established in 1868

Our project began with the rudimentary of questions: what is Ketchup?

Wikipedia delivered a brief elaboration on the terminology and a small picture of a Ketchup advertisement by the Curtice Brothers from 1868. Without any particular intention, we followed this nostalgic reference and found that this brand had been abandoned years ago. We decided to continue their story and became the new Curtice Brothers. This is what we stand for:

  1. Our ketchup is hand-made.
  2. We use organic ingredients from Tuscany – “La Dolce Vita” in a bottle.
  3. The flavours vary just like the weather and the seasons.
  4. We approach love and cooking with the same reckless abandon.
  5. Natural ingredients define the flavor.
  6. No Compromises.
Our recipe prescribes the use of fresh organic produce from local farmers and certified suppliers of herbs and spices - opposed to concentrated tomato paste and pulverised flavourings that are commonly used in the production of 'Ketchup'. In late summer 2014 we visited organic agricultural cooperations in northern Italy to learn more about farming in Tuscany, an area close to the open sea with sandy, mineral-rich, sub-alkaline soil which generates a great balance of sugar and acidity in their tomatoes. We met vegetable growers face to face and selected local partners who guarantee to supply the ingredients for our Ketchup in organic quality and harvested under fair labor standards.

Meet the Curtice Brothers

Mario - Modern nomad - never settles for compromises

I grew up in a restaurant and I could not imagine any better subject to focus on than the creation of something as vital as good food.

When I was served the leading brand for breakfast in some hotel in remote Oman, I asked myself why people all over the world were compromising on quality over availability.With less than 21% tomatoes inside that bottle of ketchup I was convinced of a desire for a healthier and better tasting alternative. This alternative, of course, would not be aproduct to please the masses - our ketchup is intended for people who acknowledge and appreciate good food. We don't want our ketchup to end up on some dull BigMac buton a freshly prepared burger or a good steak; our ketchup comes with food you eat with pleasure, not on the run

Christoph - German lunatic who believes that obstinacy is a virtue

In life only two things matter: Love and Food; how could we better express our love for food than through the creation of our own condiment?

Approximately two years ago Mario asked me to come to Vienna on an urgent matter, but he did not want to tell me what for. A few days later we met in a smoky shisha lounge where he told me what all this excitement was about: he wanted to cook ketchup!

Having worked with Mario on several ventures over the past decade, we both got used to patiently listen to even the craziest ideas, but this one sounded wicked. A fewshishas and a bottle of wine later we had reached a point from which there was no turning back; we decided to do it.

Andreas - Swedish & living in London .. who loves a sneaky burger with a good tomato sauce.

“It was easy saying yes to join my fellow brothers on the journey of bringing the Curtice Brothers ketchup back to life. With a genuine, deep rooted and strong passion for quality, we all share the vision to create a better ketchup alternative to likeminded people wanting an honest, quality product.

Living in Tunbridge Wells, UK since 1995 with Anna and daughter Maya and in the little spare time I have, I watch West Ham United play 'innebandy' and go to rock gigs. I'mquite handy in the kitchen and cook some mean dinners for family & friends, which is the best way to relax after hectic days running a group of Japanese restaurants

Philipp - a foodie, he loves cooking - some even say he’s pretty good in doing that..

Ever since I was a boy we were travelling a lot and no matter if it was in the southern part of Austria were my mom comes from or on the other end of the world, my parentsalways made me try wired groceries and dishes so I soon realized that food gives a wide variety for tastes and expectations. So I happened to end up in a tourism school inVienna to get more insights into the business. A two years stay in US after graduation allowed me to get a totally new view on the burger and condiments scenery. After doinga little excursion into the bagel business with Mario about 10 years ago where a real friendship developed I thought it was a fantastic idea from him to create our own naturalketchup and to revitalize this old brand. My strictest reviewer in all circumstances is my son Sammy who would never sugarcoat something and to my surprise he absolutelysupports the idea of creating a pure, good tasting and authentic product. So the Curtice Bros are back to life and keen to get your feedback on THE KETCHUP.

Enrico - the “real Italian” in the team … who enjoys food with friends and family

“When Mario told me about the idea to produce organic ketchup with friends he would go on holidays with, I got a flashback to my childhood. My father comes from Naples(Italy) and we went every year in the summertime to my Nonna (Grandmother). During this 3 Weeks she bottled 200 bottles with fresh tomato and basil to take back toGermany. She always said "so you can have the whole next year the Italian sun and the taste of the summer from the bottle and don’t need to suffer in the cold north”. Nowwe produce our own Ketchup with real Italian tomatoes to share with everybody who loves “La dolce vita” the whole year.

Ehren - keeps way too many condiments in his refrigerator and needs one perfect ketchup.

“I am a wine and beverage professional who grew up and currently reside in New York City. I am passionate about all elements of taste and a firm believer that pairing theright condiment, like the right wine, can enhance one's experience with food. When choosing to represent a certain wine in any of the restaurants I've worked, it has to meet 3criteria: a) it must evoke a sense of place, b) it must be crafted by individuals who are both authentic and passionate about how they approach their craft and c) it must havetypicity and taste great! Bottom-line, ketchup should taste like tomatoes. With Curtice Brothers, I couldn't miss an opportunity to craft a product that speaks of its origin while working alongside like-minded hospitality professionals and friends. The end result is something unique and delicious!”

story:
Hello!  We are Brooke and Szerena of Gold Mountain Farms, a small farm tucked away in the foothills of California's Gold Country.  Our land is located just a few miles from where California's Gold Rush began.  This beautiful area is still energized with the entrepreneurial spirit of those who came to seek a different life. 

We are passionate about the realities, challenges and solutions for the future of California's agriculture.  Our historic drought continues on and water supplies are dwindling across the state.  Most fertile farmland is either depleted of nutrients or overpriced for the family farmer to purchase.  The reality of farming in California is finding a way to grow food despite a lack of water and fertile soil.  But, there is a way to grow bountiful supplies of food with very little water and no soil.  We want to share our adventure into aquaponics farming with you.  And this is how we will do it: with fish, lots and lots of fish and your help!



Aquaponics is an exciting method of farming that is enjoying a renewed interest in the agricultural community.  To simplify, water is cycled out of a large fish tank and into a grow bed filled with any vegetable or fruit you fancy.  Naturally occurring beneficial bacteria convert the fish waste into a form of nitrogen fertilizer which in turn feed the plants.  The water is cleaned by the plants and returned to the fish tank clear and fresh only to be recycled again and again.  This method of farming not only reduces water use by 90%, but grows vegetables twice as fast as conventional dirt farming!  It also produces healthy nutritious vegetables, fruits AND fish for human consumption. Growing and consuming your own fresh water fish takes pressure off natural fisheries in the ocean and rivers and provides an ecologically friendly protein source.  There are NO pesticides, NO herbicides and NO chemicals used in this system.  The fish do all the work!  Because the system is soil-less (plants are grown in clay pellets or floated in the water) there are no gophers to worry about, no bug infestations to fight and most important of all, food can be grown anywhere there is space for a fish tank.  Small or large, all it takes are fish, plants and basic plumbing. 



Our farm land is of the typical hot, dry and rocky California foothills variety and it has been a challenge to find plants and farming methods that will thrive in these conditions.  Aquaponics is the solution for us as it is for those living in other hard to farm areas.  Aquaponics requires no tilling of the soil.  It requires no soil at all!  We won't have to bring in large truck loads of manure or amendments.  We won't need to own a tractor.  By building our system inside a greenhouse, we can also control the temperature and thus continue to farm even when the heat bakes in the summer and the snow falls in the winter.   Farming inside means we won't have to chase off the deer and bears and rabbits. In other words, we will be able to create a more profitable, vibrant and successful farm while letting the natural world around us live without harassment.   There really is no better farming method on the planet that is so bountiful and yet carries such a small ecological footprint.  



Our goal is to create an aquaponics greenhouse here on our farm and provide advice to others looking to be self sustaining.  Our experience building such a large system will provide us with the tools to assist others in building the garden of their dreams.  Many of our perks for our campaign include the blueprints and instructions for building your own system, advice on aquaponics farming and an aquaponics instructional booklet.  We want you to learn as much as we will building this system and our hope is to inspire others to "Go Aquaponic" with us!  

As vegetarians, we won't be eating the fish in our system, but will instead provide an aquatic home for hundreds of goldfish and koi.   As an alternative to eating our fish, we will offer our koi for sale to backyard pond enthusiasts.  So whether or not you eat fish, farmers can still benefit monetarily from keeping fish on the farm.  Plus, koi are just amazingly beautiful fish to be around.



To get our project up and running, we will need a large greenhouse (18' x 40'), several 300 gallon fish tanks, multiple grow beds and various plumbing, solar and carpentry items...not to mention the fish!  We estimate the project can be completed and successfully operating with a budget of $18,000.  Once the system is running, we will be able to host free workshops for the public and 4-H/FFA programs.    Your support will help make not only our aquaponics farm possible, but will lay the foundation for a community and state-wide food revolution! 

Aquaponics can bring fresh and nutritious food into the concrete jungle.  It can revitalize rural communities suffering from drought and economic hardship.  It can empower families to feed themselves and create a smaller ecological footprint for everyone.

Of course, farming is never easy and we expect a few bumps along the way.  Plumbing such a large system will be a tough task but not something we can't handle.  There is always the possibility of having to do many adjustments until the water flows just right, the fish habitats are perfect and the plants thrive.  Your support gives us the ability to take this plunge into the world's most sustainable food system.  We are ready to get our hands and feet wet!



If you would like to support our project in a non-monetary way, please help us get the word out to friends and family. And if you can help out by funding our project, we thank you immensely for enabling us to create a living, flowing and sustainable food system that is beneficial for all!

Learn more about aquaponics by watching this well-done news clip about a farmer and chef in Southern California using aquaponic farming:

http://www.cctv-america.com/2015/04/10/farm-of-...
story_txt:
Hello!  We are Brooke and Szerena of Gold Mountain Farms, a small farm tucked away in the foothills of California's Gold Country.  Our land is located just a few miles from where California's Gold Rush began.  This beautiful area is still energized with the entrepreneurial spirit of those who came to seek a different life. 

    We are passionate about the realities, challenges and solutions for the future of California's agriculture.  Our historic drought continues on and water supplies are dwindling across the state.  Most fertile farmland is either depleted of nutrients or overpriced for the family farmer to purchase.  The reality of farming in California is finding a way to grow food despite a lack of water and fertile soil.  But, there is a way to grow bountiful supplies of food with very little water and no soil.  We want to share our adventure into aquaponics farming with you.  And this is how we will do it: with fish, lots and lots of fish and your help!

story:
Welcome to Star Ridge

  Hi! We’re Star Ridge Retreat—a first of its kind sustainable Glamping adventure located in Northern California Wine Country. But we are so much more than that. Sure, you’ll be able to sleep in the lap of luxury in a yurt or a canvas wall tent, and, sure, we will be able to help you find your perfect adventure for the day, whether that adventure is a tandem skydive, zip lining through the redwood canopy, tasting the legendary wines of Sonoma County, or simply relaxing at a spa. Do you like watersports? Check! Hiking, biking, cycling? Check!  Sonoma County has all that and more. Great restaurants, art galleries, live theatre; heck, we even have casinos located just minutes away. But what if your sense of adventure takes you off the beaten path just a little more? What if you are part of a group of like-minded individuals all after the same kinds of adventures? Suppose you’ve always wanted to learn how to keep bees? Or lead a more sustainable lifestyle? What if you could find all of that in one place?

  We are working to create just that—a place where people can be outside and feel inside. We want to fill a small void here in Sonoma County. Our plan is to make Star Ridge a destination for anyone who is tired of the same old, same old.  This area doesn’t have enough decent, affordable lodging to accommodate everyone who wants to come to wine country. A recent study acknowledged that if Sonoma County were to add 1,000 rooms to its inventory, there would still be enough demand to accommodate them.  We want to help fill that void, just a little: thirty-eight people at a time. At the same time, we want to demonstrate that vacation travel doesn’t have to be wasteful. It doesn’t have to have a detrimental impact on the environment. In fact, we want to ensure that people who stay with us have the opportunity to learn how they can reduce their own impact, and live a life designed to tread lightly in the world.  We plan to offer hands-on sustainable practice classes for anyone interested. We want to introduce our Glampers to the outside world; its wonders and its charms, its strengths and where it is weakest, and how we, as the world's people, can help by becoming responsible stewards for the earth.

Welcome to Star Ridge Retreat where the Inside Meets the Outside!

What We Need & What You Get

  We have been working with civil engineers and an environmental scientist to create a special place where we can support nature, clean up past damage, and restore habitat for fish and wildlife in order to be able to come together in small groups and create a synergy that restores and revitalizes not only us, but Mother Nature as well.  We’ve already invested tens of thousands of dollars and countless hours to clean up the land, restore a more natural habitat, and in planning and preliminary permitting, but our next step is to install infrastructure. Partly because of the drought here in California, we need an on-site water source and, in addition, plan to install a gray water reclamation and catchment system that supports landscaping, wildlife habitat, and contributes to water conservation. This system will be the first of its kind in Sonoma County. Our hope is that this will not be our last sustainable innovation—in other words, we hope to continue that legacy of working with the county to see that even more sustainable practices are adopted by the county and therefore approved for subsequent implementers down the road. 

  This is Phase One of our endeavor. We need your help to drill a well and get the basic infrastructure in place and to get the gray water treatment and catchment system designed and approved by the county.  Though we have preliminary approval from the county to build such a system, they will still need to approve the actual plans.  At this point, it looks like the basic well drilling will cost about $15,000 without adding plumbing and connections for later use which may cost another $12,000 to install. The gray water system designs alone will cost about $10,000 with an additional $13,000 paid to the county for the cost of the permits. 

  We also want to install our star-gazing platform.  Near the top of our 25 acres, we have a plateau perfectly suited for watching the sunset and sunrise, and for star-gazing.  We have already started the process of inviting a local astronomy group to come on a regular basis to guide our Glampers through the heavens. Add another $10,000.

  We also want to erect our first tent site. Depending on the funds we receive, we’d like that first site to have a Yurt. But it may end up being a wall tent. Either way, we will get first-hand experience on what it takes to build the platform, erect the tent and install infrastructure. There's another $10,000.

We know that part of what drives this crowd sourcing effort is the percs involved.  Yet, every perc we offer takes a bit of our bottom line out from under us.  If a perc cost us 20% of the cost of a donation and another 5% to ship, then we can only use $7.50 of every $10 you donate, which means we have to inflate our goal in order to meet the demands of our perc offerings.  Don’t get me wrong—we will be offering some fabulous percs—skydiving, ziplining, wine tasting, etc, but mostly, we want to offer percs that demonstrate sustainability and don’t ding the bottom line too much.  

So what’s in it for you?

  Well, if you visit wine country, then the obvious is the chance to take advantage of what we will be offering sometime in the next 12 -16 months. Our overnight rates for exactly what a hotel offers: a double bed, heat and electricity—as well as all of the other adjuncts I mentioned—will be highly competitive.  Our Yurts will go for less than $200/night.  Also, you will be able to express your inner altruistic self; contributing to an endeavor designed to be as sustainable on its own as possible and to take the sustainability message to as many people as will listen. 

  Our next phases will raise funds for actually installing the gray water system, buying tents and Yurts, installing electrical and other infrastructure, building a central pavilion where Glampers can meet. We will have a full A/V array in that pavilion so that groups can make powerpoint presentations or simply watch movies.  We will have walking trails and gather spots all over the property where individuals, couples or small groups can take advantage of the scenery.  The property already boasts a small lake and a smaller pond.  In the future, we plan on converting the small pond into a swimming area where the water is naturally filtered by plants and sunlight, and to install a complete solar array that will power all the needs of the retreat.  However, in order to do that we must demonstrate a year’s worth of power use prior to actually designing a system.

Most importantly, this project will raise awareness of sustainable travel, contribute to the health and well being of Mother Earth, and be a role model for future endeavors by like minded people who hope to reduce, reuse, and recycle in their everyday lives.

Don’t worry if you feel you can’t donate. There are plenty of ways for you to show your support of what we are trying to do here. Tell your friends, talk about it on Facebook, show people what we are doing. Come visit us when you can.  Once we are up and running, we will be offering all kinds of educational experiences for not only our guests, but anyone interested in learning what sustainability can mean for them.

Most importantly, let us know how you feel about what we are doing here.  I came late to the sustainability party, but I am completely convinced of its relevance, its importance, and the logic of trying to make sure that we continue to have a welcoming place to live.

story:
As we are all of the slightly more alternative type and will be a bit low on money in the coming months we thought living in a caravan would be an ideal solution. Furthermore, we really want to do this. We are thinking about setting up a small community of caravans where people can come to hang out, be creative and have fun while also providing an alternative for travelers who are not interested in staying in hotels and such.

Regarding the money, we are going to use it for materials, some inventory and solarpanels as we want to be as off grid as possible and will need power for heating eventually. (Norway is cold!)
